GE09ram_02su:1: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:4: tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava // RamS_2,1.2 //
GE09ram_02su:8: mātḥṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // RamS_2,1.4 //
GE09ram_02su:10: svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha // RamS_2,1.5 //
GE09ram_02su:11: sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:13: tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:14: bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // RamS_2,1.7 //
GE09ram_02su:15: rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau /
GE09ram_02su:17: sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:18: svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ // RamS_2,1.9 //
GE09ram_02su:19: teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:20: svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ // RamS_2,1.10 //
GE09ram_02su:21: gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:24: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // RamS_2,1.12 //
GE09ram_02su:27: evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā /
GE09ram_02su:29: sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:32: na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā // RamS_2,1.16 //
GE09ram_02su:34: kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api // RamS_2,1.17 //
GE09ram_02su:36: vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ // RamS_2,1.18 //
GE09ram_02su:42: śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api // RamS_2,1.21 //
GE09ram_02su:43: arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:48: apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:49: anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī /
GE09ram_02su:50: na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ // RamS_2,1.24 //*
GE09ram_02su:51: evaṃ śreṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:53: buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ // RamS_2,1.25 //
GE09ram_02su:55: guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // RamS_2,1.26 //
GE09ram_02su:58: etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:59: dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ // RamS_2,1.28 //
GE09ram_02su:60: eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi samparivartate /
GE09ram_02su:61: kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam // RamS_2,1.29 //
GE09ram_02su:63: mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // RamS_2,1.30 //
GE09ram_02su:65: mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ // RamS_2,1.31 //
GE09ram_02su:66: mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:67: anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām // RamS_2,1.32 //
GE09ram_02su:68: taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:69: niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata // RamS_2,1.33 //
GE09ram_02su:73: rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ // RamS_2,1.35 //
GE09ram_02su:74: sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:75: upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ //
GE09ram_02su:78: hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,2.1 //
GE09ram_02su:80: svareṇa mahatā rājā jīmūta iva nādayan // RamS_2,2.2 //
GE09ram_02su:82: śreyasā yoktukāmo 'smi sukhārham akhilaṃ jagat // RamS_2,2.3 //
GE09ram_02su:84: prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā // RamS_2,2.4 //
GE09ram_02su:85: idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam /
GE09ram_02su:86: pāṇḍur asyātapatrasya chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā // RamS_2,2.5 //
GE09ram_02su:90: pariśrānto 'smi lokasya gurvīṃ dharmadhuraṃ vahan // RamS_2,2.7 //
GE09ram_02su:91: so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite /
GE09ram_02su:92: saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān // RamS_2,2.8 //
GE09ram_02su:93: anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:95: taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_02su:97: anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:98: trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram // RamS_2,2.11 //
GE09ram_02su:99: anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm /
GE09ram_02su:100: gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai // RamS_2,2.12 //
GE09ram_02su:101: iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:102: vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ // RamS_2,2.13 //
GE09ram_02su:104: ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // RamS_2,2.14 //
GE09ram_02su:106: sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam // RamS_2,2.15 //
GE09ram_02su:107: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam /
GE09ram_02su:108: ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,2.16 //
GE09ram_02su:109: kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati /
GE09ram_02su:110: bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam // RamS_2,2.17 //
GE09ram_02su:111: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02su:112: bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te // RamS_2,2.18 //
GE09ram_02su:114: ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate // RamS_2,2.19 //
GE09ram_02su:116: dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ // RamS_2,2.20 //
GE09ram_02su:118: mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ // RamS_2,2.21 //
GE09ram_02su:119: priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:121: tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate /
GE09ram_02su:123: yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:125: saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā /
GE09ram_02su:126: paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati // RamS_2,2.25 //
GE09ram_02su:128: nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān // RamS_2,2.26 //
GE09ram_02su:129: śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:130: iti naḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ sadā rāmo 'bhibhāṣate // RamS_2,2.27 //
GE09ram_02su:132: utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati // RamS_2,2.28 //
GE09ram_02su:134: vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:135: diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ // RamS_2,2.29 //
GE09ram_02su:136: balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:137: āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā // RamS_2,2.30 //
GE09ram_02su:138: abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:139: striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyamprātaḥ samāhitāḥ // RamS_2,2.31 //
GE09ram_02su:141: teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām // RamS_2,2.32 //
GE09ram_02su:144: taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam /
GE09ram_02su:145: hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi //
GE09ram_02su:148: pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,3.1 //
GE09ram_02su:150: yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha // RamS_2,3.2 //
GE09ram_02su:151: iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:152: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām // RamS_2,3.3 //
GE09ram_02su:153: caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:155: kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim /
GE09ram_02su:157: tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:158: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīyatām iti // RamS_2,3.6 //
GE09ram_02su:160: rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃcakre rathena rathināṃ varam // RamS_2,3.7 //
GE09ram_02su:161: atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:162: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ // RamS_2,3.8 //
GE09ram_02su:163: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:164: upāsāṃcakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam // RamS_2,3.9 //
GE09ram_02su:165: teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:172: na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ // RamS_2,3.13 //
GE09ram_02su:174: pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // RamS_2,3.14 //
GE09ram_02su:176: āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,3.15 //
GE09ram_02su:177: sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike /
GE09ram_02su:178: nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ // RamS_2,3.16 //
GE09ram_02su:179: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:180: gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam // RamS_2,3.17 //
GE09ram_02su:182: dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam // RamS_2,3.18 //
GE09ram_02su:184: svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ // RamS_2,3.19 //
GE09ram_02su:187: taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:189: sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:190: uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ // RamS_2,3.22 //
GE09ram_02su:191: jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:192: utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ // RamS_2,3.23 //
GE09ram_02su:193: tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:194: tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi // RamS_2,3.24 //
GE09ram_02su:195: kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi /
GE09ram_02su:196: guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam // RamS_2,3.25 //
GE09ram_02su:197: bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:203: tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara // RamS_2,3.28 //
GE09ram_02su:204: tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:205: tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan // RamS_2,3.29 //
GE09ram_02su:206: sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:209: yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ // RamS_2,3.31 //
GE09ram_02su:210: te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tacchrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya /
GE09ram_02su:211: narendram āmantrya gṛhāṇi gatvā devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:213: gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:214: mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam // RamS_2,4.1 //
GE09ram_02su:215: śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyas tu me sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:216: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ // RamS_2,4.2 //
GE09ram_02su:218: sūtam ājñāpayāmāsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya // RamS_2,4.3 //
GE09ram_02su:219: pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau /
GE09ram_02su:220: rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ // RamS_2,4.4 //
GE09ram_02su:222: śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat // RamS_2,4.5 //
GE09ram_02su:223: praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:224: yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,4.6 //
GE09ram_02su:225: tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:226: śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā // RamS_2,4.7 //
GE09ram_02su:228: prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram // RamS_2,4.8 //
GE09ram_02su:229: taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:230: praveśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam // RamS_2,4.9 //
GE09ram_02su:231: praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:232: dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ // RamS_2,4.10 //
GE09ram_02su:234: pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt // RamS_2,4.11 //
GE09ram_02su:235: rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:237: jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:238: dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama // RamS_2,4.13 //
GE09ram_02su:239: anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:242: ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi // RamS_2,4.15 //
GE09ram_02su:243: adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam /
GE09ram_02su:244: atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka // RamS_2,4.16 //
GE09ram_02su:245: api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān /
GE09ram_02su:246: sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ // RamS_2,4.17 //
GE09ram_02su:247: avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:250: rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati // RamS_2,4.19 //
GE09ram_02su:251: tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:252: tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ // RamS_2,4.20 //
GE09ram_02su:253: adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum /
GE09ram_02su:254: śvaḥ puṣyayogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ // RamS_2,4.21 //
GE09ram_02su:256: śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa // RamS_2,4.22 //
GE09ram_02su:259: suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:260: bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi // RamS_2,4.24 //
GE09ram_02su:261: viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:262: tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama // RamS_2,4.25 //
GE09ram_02su:263: kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:265: kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:266: satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava // RamS_2,4.27 //
GE09ram_02su:268: vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham // RamS_2,4.28 //
GE09ram_02su:270: tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau // RamS_2,4.29 //
GE09ram_02su:271: tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm /
GE09ram_02su:272: vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam // RamS_2,4.30 //
GE09ram_02su:273: prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:274: sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,4.31 //
GE09ram_02su:275: tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:280: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā // RamS_2,4.34 //
GE09ram_02su:282: bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ // RamS_2,4.35 //
GE09ram_02su:284: evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā // RamS_2,4.36 //
GE09ram_02su:285: yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane /
GE09ram_02su:286: tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya // RamS_2,4.37 //
GE09ram_02su:288: harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata // RamS_2,4.38 //
GE09ram_02su:289: vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:290: jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya // RamS_2,4.39 //
GE09ram_02su:291: kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka /
GE09ram_02su:292: yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā // RamS_2,4.40 //
GE09ram_02su:293: amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe /
GE09ram_02su:294: yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // RamS_2,4.41 //
GE09ram_02su:295: ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:296: prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva // RamS_2,4.42 //
GE09ram_02su:297: lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:298: dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā // RamS_2,4.43 //
GE09ram_02su:299: saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:300: jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye // RamS_2,4.44 //
GE09ram_02su:301: ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:302: abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // RamS_2,4.45 //
GE09ram_02su:305: purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt // RamS_2,5.1 //
GE09ram_02su:308: tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:309: svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam // RamS_2,5.3 //
GE09ram_02su:311: tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ // RamS_2,5.4 //
GE09ram_02su:312: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:313: mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt // RamS_2,5.5 //
GE09ram_02su:316: sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambhāṣyābhiprasādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:317: priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ // RamS_2,5.7 //
GE09ram_02su:318: prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi /
GE09ram_02su:319: upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā // RamS_2,5.8 //
GE09ram_02su:320: prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:321: pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā // RamS_2,5.9 //
GE09ram_02su:322: ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam /
GE09ram_02su:323: mantravat kārayāmāsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ // RamS_2,5.10 //
GE09ram_02su:324: tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:326: suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:327: sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,5.12 //
GE09ram_02su:331: nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam // RamS_2,5.14 //
GE09ram_02su:339: rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ // RamS_2,5.18 //
GE09ram_02su:341: utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyāmahotsavam // RamS_2,5.19 //
GE09ram_02su:343: vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rājakulaṃ yayau // RamS_2,5.20 //
GE09ram_02su:346: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:347: papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat // RamS_2,5.22 //
GE09ram_02su:348: guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam /
GE09ram_02su:349: viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva // RamS_2,5.23 //
GE09ram_02su:351: vidīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:354: saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat // RamS_2,6.1 //
GE09ram_02su:355: pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā /
GE09ram_02su:357: śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:358: dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare // RamS_2,6.3 //
GE09ram_02su:360: śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ // RamS_2,6.4 //
GE09ram_02su:364: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ // RamS_2,6.6 //
GE09ram_02su:369: kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:370: ayodhyānilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ // RamS_2,6.9 //
GE09ram_02su:372: prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ // RamS_2,6.10 //
GE09ram_02su:374: catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca // RamS_2,6.11 //
GE09ram_02su:376: kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca // RamS_2,6.12 //
GE09ram_02su:377: sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca /
GE09ram_02su:378: dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā // RamS_2,6.13 //
GE09ram_02su:380: manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ // RamS_2,6.14 //
GE09ram_02su:381: rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:382: rāmābhiṣeke samprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca // RamS_2,6.15 //
GE09ram_02su:384: rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ // RamS_2,6.16 //
GE09ram_02su:386: rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane // RamS_2,6.17 //
GE09ram_02su:388: dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,6.18 //
GE09ram_02su:391: sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca /
GE09ram_02su:392: kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam // RamS_2,6.20 //
GE09ram_02su:394: jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,6.21 //
GE09ram_02su:395: sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:398: yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,6.23 //
GE09ram_02su:402: digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ // RamS_2,6.25 //
GE09ram_02su:403: te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam /
GE09ram_02su:404: rāmasya pūrayāmāsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ // RamS_2,6.26 //
GE09ram_02su:405: janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:407: tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:408: samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam //
GE09ram_02su:410: jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā /
GE09ram_02su:413: ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata // RamS_2,7.2 //
GE09ram_02su:415: siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām // RamS_2,7.3 //
GE09ram_02su:416: avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā /
GE09ram_02su:418: rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ samprayacchati /
GE09ram_02su:419: atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me /
GE09ram_02su:420: kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi samprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ // RamS_2,7.5 //
GE09ram_02su:422: ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam // RamS_2,7.6 //
GE09ram_02su:425: dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā /
GE09ram_02su:428: śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,7.9 //
GE09ram_02su:429: uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate /
GE09ram_02su:430: upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase // RamS_2,7.10 //
GE09ram_02su:432: calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyāḥ srota ivoṣṇage // RamS_2,7.11 //
GE09ram_02su:433: evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:434: kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param // RamS_2,7.12 //
GE09ram_02su:435: kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare /
GE09ram_02su:436: viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām // RamS_2,7.13 //
GE09ram_02su:437: mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram /
GE09ram_02su:439: sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:440: viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam // RamS_2,7.15 //
GE09ram_02su:445: tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet /
GE09ram_02su:446: tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,7.18 //
GE09ram_02su:448: ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase // RamS_2,7.19 //
GE09ram_02su:449: dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:450: śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā // RamS_2,7.20 //
GE09ram_02su:452: arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati // RamS_2,7.21 //
GE09ram_02su:453: apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu /
GE09ram_02su:454: kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake // RamS_2,7.22 //
GE09ram_02su:456: āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā // RamS_2,7.23 //
GE09ram_02su:457: yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:458: rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā // RamS_2,7.24 //
GE09ram_02su:460: rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi // RamS_2,7.25 //
GE09ram_02su:461: sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:462: trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane // RamS_2,7.26 //
GE09ram_02su:463: mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā /
GE09ram_02su:464: evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham // RamS_2,7.27 //
GE09ram_02su:465: dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā /
GE09ram_02su:466: kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam // RamS_2,7.28 //
GE09ram_02su:467: idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:468: etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te // RamS_2,7.29 //
GE09ram_02su:469: rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:470: tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,7.30 //
GE09ram_02su:471: na me paraṃ kiṃcid itas tvayā punaḥ priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam /
GE09ram_02su:472: tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ vṛṇu //
GE09ram_02su:474: mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat /
GE09ram_02su:476: harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe /
GE09ram_02su:479: yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ // RamS_2,8.3 //
GE09ram_02su:480: prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam /
GE09ram_02su:481: upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // RamS_2,8.4 //
GE09ram_02su:482: hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:483: aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye // RamS_2,8.5 //
GE09ram_02su:484: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:485: rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha // RamS_2,8.6 //
GE09ram_02su:486: dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:487: rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati // RamS_2,8.7 //
GE09ram_02su:488: bhrātḥn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:489: saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,8.8 //
GE09ram_02su:490: bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param /
GE09ram_02su:492: sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare /
GE09ram_02su:494: kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām // RamS_2,8.10 //
GE09ram_02su:496: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,8.11 //
GE09ram_02su:499: bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:500: rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate // RamS_2,8.13 //
GE09ram_02su:501: na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:502: sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet // RamS_2,8.14 //
GE09ram_02su:503: tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:504: sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api // RamS_2,8.15 //
GE09ram_02su:506: anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale // RamS_2,8.16 //
GE09ram_02su:507: sāhaṃ tvadarthe samprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase /
GE09ram_02su:508: sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi // RamS_2,8.17 //
GE09ram_02su:509: dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:510: deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā // RamS_2,8.18 //
GE09ram_02su:511: bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:512: saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api // RamS_2,8.19 //
GE09ram_02su:513: goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:514: aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam // RamS_2,8.20 //
GE09ram_02su:515: tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃcit kariṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:516: rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,8.21 //
GE09ram_02su:517: tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:518: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava // RamS_2,8.22 //
GE09ram_02su:519: evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:520: yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati // RamS_2,8.23 //
GE09ram_02su:521: sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:522: samṛddhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe // RamS_2,8.24 //
GE09ram_02su:524: pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi // RamS_2,8.25 //
GE09ram_02su:526: rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet // RamS_2,8.26 //
GE09ram_02su:527: yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:528: ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje parasya cādyaiva vivāsakāraṇam //
GE09ram_02su:530: evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā /
GE09ram_02su:531: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.1 //
GE09ram_02su:532: adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:534: idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare /
GE09ram_02su:535: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // RamS_2,9.3 //
GE09ram_02su:536: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:537: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.4 //
GE09ram_02su:538: hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GE09ram_02su:539: yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam // RamS_2,9.5 //
GE09ram_02su:540: śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī /
GE09ram_02su:541: kiṃcid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.6 //
GE09ram_02su:543: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // RamS_2,9.7 //
GE09ram_02su:544: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:545: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,9.8 //
GE09ram_02su:546: tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:547: agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt // RamS_2,9.9 //
GE09ram_02su:548: diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati /
GE09ram_02su:549: vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ // RamS_2,9.10 //
GE09ram_02su:550: sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:551: dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ // RamS_2,9.11 //
GE09ram_02su:552: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:553: apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ // RamS_2,9.12 //
GE09ram_02su:554: tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:555: tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane // RamS_2,9.13 //
GE09ram_02su:556: sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau /
GE09ram_02su:557: gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:558: anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā // RamS_2,9.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:560: pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa // RamS_2,9.15 //
GE09ram_02su:563: mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ // RamS_2,9.16 //*
GE09ram_02su:564: dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:565: tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam // RamS_2,9.17 //
GE09ram_02su:566: na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum /
GE09ram_02su:567: tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet // RamS_2,9.18 //
GE09ram_02su:568: na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:571: dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // RamS_2,9.20 //
GE09ram_02su:572: yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt /
GE09ram_02su:573: tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet // RamS_2,9.21 //
GE09ram_02su:574: yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:575: vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam // RamS_2,9.22 //
GE09ram_02su:576: rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:577: bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ // RamS_2,9.23 //
GE09ram_02su:579: bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,9.24 //
GE09ram_02su:580: yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:581: tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:582: saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān // RamS_2,9.25 //*
GE09ram_02su:583: prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā /
GE09ram_02su:585: anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā /
GE09ram_02su:586: hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.27 //
GE09ram_02su:588: pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye // RamS_2,9.28 //
GE09ram_02su:589: tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:590: nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam // RamS_2,9.29 //
GE09ram_02su:592: tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā // RamS_2,9.30 //
GE09ram_02su:593: uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam /
GE09ram_02su:594: adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam // RamS_2,9.31 //
GE09ram_02su:596: jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau // RamS_2,9.32 //
GE09ram_02su:598: agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase // RamS_2,9.33 //
GE09ram_02su:599: tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam /
GE09ram_02su:600: matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te // RamS_2,9.34 //
GE09ram_02su:601: atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm /
GE09ram_02su:602: abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate // RamS_2,9.35 //
GE09ram_02su:604: labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu // RamS_2,9.36 //
GE09ram_02su:605: mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:606: kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // RamS_2,9.37 //
GE09ram_02su:609: gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam // RamS_2,9.38 //*
GE09ram_02su:611: pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama // RamS_2,9.39 //
GE09ram_02su:612: iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:613: śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva // RamS_2,9.40 //
GE09ram_02su:615: uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya // RamS_2,9.41 //
GE09ram_02su:616: tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:619: avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // RamS_2,9.43 //
GE09ram_02su:620: tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyavaśaṃ gatā /
GE09ram_02su:621: saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.44 //
GE09ram_02su:622: iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:623: vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim // RamS_2,9.45 //
GE09ram_02su:624: athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī /
GE09ram_02su:625: asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ tadādhiśiśye patiteva kiṃnarī // RamS_2,9.46
GE09ram_02su:627: narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā //
GE09ram_02su:630: priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī // RamS_2,10.1 //
GE09ram_02su:631: tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām /
GE09ram_02su:632: pratapta iva duḥkhena so 'paśyaj jagatīpatiḥ // RamS_2,10.2 //
GE09ram_02su:633: sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm /
GE09ram_02su:635: kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane /
GE09ram_02su:636: mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām // RamS_2,10.4 //
GE09ram_02su:638: kāmī kamalapattrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam // RamS_2,10.5 //
GE09ram_02su:639: na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam /
GE09ram_02su:640: devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā // RamS_2,10.6 //
GE09ram_02su:641: yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu /
GE09ram_02su:642: bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇacetasi /
GE09ram_02su:644: santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:645: sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini // RamS_2,10.8 //
GE09ram_02su:646: kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:647: kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam // RamS_2,10.9 //
GE09ram_02su:648: avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām /
GE09ram_02su:649: daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiñcanaḥ // RamS_2,10.10 //
GE09ram_02su:650: ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:651: na te kaṃcid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe // RamS_2,10.11 //
GE09ram_02su:653: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā // RamS_2,10.12 //
GE09ram_02su:654: tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:656: nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kenacin na vimānitā /
GE09ram_02su:657: abhiprāyas tu me kaścit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam // RamS_2,10.14 //
GE09ram_02su:658: pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:659: atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā // RamS_2,10.15 //
GE09ram_02su:660: evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:661: tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ // RamS_2,10.16 //
GE09ram_02su:662: avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama /
GE09ram_02su:663: manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate // RamS_2,10.17 //
GE09ram_02su:664: bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśyoddharasva me /
GE09ram_02su:665: etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase // RamS_2,10.18 //
GE09ram_02su:666: balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:667: kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape // RamS_2,10.19 //
GE09ram_02su:668: tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:670: yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:671: tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ // RamS_2,10.21 //
GE09ram_02su:672: candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:673: jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā // RamS_2,10.22 //
GE09ram_02su:675: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava // RamS_2,10.23 //
GE09ram_02su:677: varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ // RamS_2,10.24 //
GE09ram_02su:679: tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam // RamS_2,10.25 //
GE09ram_02su:680: varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate /
GE09ram_02su:681: tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ // RamS_2,10.26 //
GE09ram_02su:684: nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:687: adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane // RamS_2,10.29 //
GE09ram_02su:688: tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:689: vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ // RamS_2,10.30 //
GE09ram_02su:691: aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:693: cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:694: kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā // RamS_2,10.32 //
GE09ram_02su:696: kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā // RamS_2,10.33 //
GE09ram_02su:697: sadā te jananītulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:698: tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā // RamS_2,10.34 //
GE09ram_02su:700: avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā // RamS_2,10.35 //
GE09ram_02su:702: aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam // RamS_2,10.36 //
GE09ram_02su:703: kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam /
GE09ram_02su:704: jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam // RamS_2,10.37 //
GE09ram_02su:705: parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam /
GE09ram_02su:706: apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā // RamS_2,10.38 //
GE09ram_02su:707: tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā /
GE09ram_02su:708: na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam // RamS_2,10.39 //
GE09ram_02su:709: tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye /
GE09ram_02su:710: api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me // RamS_2,10.40 //
GE09ram_02su:711: sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat striyā gṛhīto hṛdaye 'timātrayā /
GE09ram_02su:712: papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā //
GE09ram_02su:715: yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam // RamS_2,11.1 //
GE09ram_02su:717: punar ākārayāmāsa tam eva varam aṅganā // RamS_2,11.2 //
GE09ram_02su:719: mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi // RamS_2,11.3 //
GE09ram_02su:720: evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:721: pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva // RamS_2,11.4 //
GE09ram_02su:722: mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave /
GE09ram_02su:723: hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam // RamS_2,11.5 //
GE09ram_02su:724: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:725: akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me // RamS_2,11.6 //
GE09ram_02su:727: astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // RamS_2,11.7 //
GE09ram_02su:729: rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī // RamS_2,11.8 //
GE09ram_02su:733: atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām /
GE09ram_02su:734: nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat // RamS_2,11.10 //*
GE09ram_02su:735: evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02su:736: prasādayāmāsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,11.11 //
GE09ram_02su:738: prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,11.12 //
GE09ram_02su:740: kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi // RamS_2,11.13 //
GE09ram_02su:742: śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam //
GE09ram_02su:743: tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:744: samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:747: viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt // RamS_2,12.1 //
GE09ram_02su:748: pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam /
GE09ram_02su:749: śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi // RamS_2,12.2 //
GE09ram_02su:750: āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:751: satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ // RamS_2,12.3 //
GE09ram_02su:752: saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:753: pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām // RamS_2,12.4 //
GE09ram_02su:754: tathā hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage /
GE09ram_02su:755: yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau // RamS_2,12.5 //
GE09ram_02su:756: saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:757: satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ svāṃ nātivartate // RamS_2,12.6 //
GE09ram_02su:758: samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:759: agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam // RamS_2,12.7 //
GE09ram_02su:761: nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā // RamS_2,12.8 //
GE09ram_02su:763: sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā // RamS_2,12.9 //
GE09ram_02su:764: vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:765: kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,12.10 //
GE09ram_02su:766: yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:767: taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā // RamS_2,12.11 //
GE09ram_02su:769: uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā // RamS_2,12.12 //
GE09ram_02su:770: kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam /
GE09ram_02su:771: ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi // RamS_2,12.13 //
GE09ram_02su:772: sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram /
GE09ram_02su:773: niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // RamS_2,12.14 //
GE09ram_02su:774: sa nunna iva tīkṣṇeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:775: rājā pracodito 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,12.15 //
GE09ram_02su:776: dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā /
GE09ram_02su:777: jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam // RamS_2,12.16 //
GE09ram_02su:778: iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram /
GE09ram_02su:779: svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya // RamS_2,12.17 //
GE09ram_02su:780: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:782: sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:783: pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃcit tasmād deśād apākraman // RamS_2,12.19 //
GE09ram_02su:784: yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:785: tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha // RamS_2,12.20 //
GE09ram_02su:786: sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram /
GE09ram_02su:787: sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca // RamS_2,12.21 //
GE09ram_02su:790: iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:792: tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan /
GE09ram_02su:793: dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān //
GE09ram_02su:795: te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:797: amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:802: rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvatā vyāghracarmaṇā // RamS_2,13.4 //
GE09ram_02su:804: yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca // RamS_2,13.5 //
GE09ram_02su:806: tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,13.6 //
GE09ram_02su:807: kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:811: sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam // RamS_2,13.8 //
GE09ram_02su:814: pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:815: prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate // RamS_2,13.10 //
GE09ram_02su:817: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare // RamS_2,13.11 //
GE09ram_02su:821: apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet // RamS_2,13.13 //
GE09ram_02su:822: na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:823: yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ // RamS_2,13.14 //
GE09ram_02su:825: abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // RamS_2,13.15 //
GE09ram_02su:826: ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham /
GE09ram_02su:831: budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram // RamS_2,13.18 //
GE09ram_02su:832: brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa /
GE09ram_02su:834: stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam /
GE09ram_02su:835: pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,13.20 //
GE09ram_02su:836: na caiva saṃprasupto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:837: iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ // RamS_2,13.21 //
GE09ram_02su:838: sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam /
GE09ram_02su:839: nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat // RamS_2,13.22 //
GE09ram_02su:841: sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ // RamS_2,13.23 //
GE09ram_02su:848: sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan /
GE09ram_02su:849: tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ //
GE09ram_02su:851: avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam //
GE09ram_02su:854: praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit // RamS_2,14.1 //
GE09ram_02su:858: dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān // RamS_2,14.3 //
GE09ram_02su:864: dadarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvarṇe sottaracchade // RamS_2,14.6 //
GE09ram_02su:868: upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā // RamS_2,14.8 //
GE09ram_02su:870: vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat // RamS_2,14.9 //
GE09ram_02su:873: kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:874: mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // RamS_2,14.11 //
GE09ram_02su:875: evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:876: tataḥ saṃmānayāmāsa sītām idam uvāca ha // RamS_2,14.12 //
GE09ram_02su:877: devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare /
GE09ram_02su:881: yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:882: dhruvam adyaiva māṃ rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,14.15 //
GE09ram_02su:883: hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatim /
GE09ram_02su:884: saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āsva ramasva ca // RamS_2,14.16 //
GE09ram_02su:887: sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca /
GE09ram_02su:892: prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā // RamS_2,14.20 //
GE09ram_02su:894: niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ // RamS_2,14.21 //
GE09ram_02su:896: jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ // RamS_2,14.22 //
GE09ram_02su:899: sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya /
GE09ram_02su:900: ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya // RamS_2,14.24
GE09ram_02su:901: eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya rājaprasādād vipulāṅgam iṣyan /
GE09ram_02su:902: ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā /
GE09ram_02su:903: lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya //
GE09ram_02su:904: sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:905: mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau //
GE09ram_02su:907: prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham //
GE09ram_02su:914: saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api // RamS_2,15.3 //
GE09ram_02su:916: yathārhaṃ cāpi sampūjya sarvān eva narān yayau // RamS_2,15.4 //
GE09ram_02su:919: yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:920: tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani // RamS_2,15.6 //
GE09ram_02su:921: alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:922: yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam // RamS_2,15.7 //
GE09ram_02su:923: ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:925: etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:926: ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham // RamS_2,15.9 //
GE09ram_02su:927: na hi tasmān manaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt /
GE09ram_02su:928: naraḥ śaknoty apākraṣṭum atikrānte 'pi rāghave // RamS_2,15.10 //
GE09ram_02su:929: sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām /
GE09ram_02su:930: caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ // RamS_2,15.11 //
GE09ram_02su:932: rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan // RamS_2,15.12 //
GE09ram_02su:934: saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // RamS_2,15.13 //
GE09ram_02su:935: tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje /
GE09ram_02su:936: pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ //
GE09ram_02su:938: sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe /
GE09ram_02su:940: sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat /
GE09ram_02su:941: tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ // RamS_2,16.2 //
GE09ram_02su:943: śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum // RamS_2,16.3 //
GE09ram_02su:944: tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:945: rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam // RamS_2,16.4 //
GE09ram_02su:949: upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā // RamS_2,16.6 //
GE09ram_02su:950: acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan /
GE09ram_02su:951: babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // RamS_2,16.7 //
GE09ram_02su:952: cintayāmāsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:953: kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati // RamS_2,16.8 //
GE09ram_02su:954: anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati /
GE09ram_02su:955: tasya mām adya samprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate // RamS_2,16.9 //
GE09ram_02su:957: kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,16.10 //
GE09ram_02su:958: kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā /
GE09ram_02su:959: kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya // RamS_2,16.11 //
GE09ram_02su:960: vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:961: śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate /
GE09ram_02su:962: saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham // RamS_2,16.12 //*
GE09ram_02su:963: kaccin na kiṃcid bharate kumāre priyadarśane /
GE09ram_02su:964: śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātḥṇāṃ vā mamāśubham // RamS_2,16.13 //
GE09ram_02su:965: atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:966: muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe // RamS_2,16.14 //
GE09ram_02su:968: kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate // RamS_2,16.15 //
GE09ram_02su:969: kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃcid abhimānāt pitā mama /
GE09ram_02su:970: ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ // RamS_2,16.16 //
GE09ram_02su:971: etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:973: ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake /
GE09ram_02su:974: bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave /
GE09ram_02su:975: niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca // RamS_2,16.18 //*
GE09ram_02su:976: tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:977: kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate // RamS_2,16.19 //
GE09ram_02su:979: uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam // RamS_2,16.20 //
GE09ram_02su:980: purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:981: rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe // RamS_2,16.21 //
GE09ram_02su:983: gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava // RamS_2,16.22 //
GE09ram_02su:984: yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:985: ātmānaṃ ca naraśreṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu // RamS_2,16.23 //
GE09ram_02su:986: sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam /
GE09ram_02su:987: tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca // RamS_2,16.24 //
GE09ram_02su:988: sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:989: abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa // RamS_2,16.25 //
GE09ram_02su:993: śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,16.27 //
GE09ram_02su:994: evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:996: idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:998: manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:999: yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ // RamS_2,16.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1000: hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca /
GE09ram_02su:1001: niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam // RamS_2,16.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1002: alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me /
GE09ram_02su:1003: svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,16.32 //
GE09ram_02su:1004: ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:1005: hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ // RamS_2,16.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1006: kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1007: tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan // RamS_2,16.34 //
GE09ram_02su:1008: tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1013: avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa // RamS_2,16.37 //
GE09ram_02su:1014: sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikeyī /
GE09ram_02su:1015: prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayāmāsa rāghavam // RamS_2,16.38 //
GE09ram_02su:1016: evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1018: tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam /
GE09ram_02su:1019: rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // RamS_2,16.40 //
GE09ram_02su:1020: vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:1021: naitat kiṃcin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // RamS_2,16.41 //
GE09ram_02su:1022: yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran /
GE09ram_02su:1023: pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // RamS_2,16.42 //
GE09ram_02su:1024: dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1025: mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite // RamS_2,16.43 //
GE09ram_02su:1027: kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // RamS_2,16.44 //
GE09ram_02su:1029: śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,16.45 //
GE09ram_02su:1030: nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe /
GE09ram_02su:1031: viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam // RamS_2,16.46 //
GE09ram_02su:1032: yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃcic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:1033: prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat // RamS_2,16.47 //
GE09ram_02su:1034: na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃcid asti mahattaram /
GE09ram_02su:1035: yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā // RamS_2,16.48 //
GE09ram_02su:1037: vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa // RamS_2,16.49 //
GE09ram_02su:1038: na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃcid āśaṃsase guṇam /
GE09ram_02su:1039: yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī // RamS_2,16.50 //
GE09ram_02su:1040: yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:1041: tato 'dyaiva gamiṣyāmi daṇḍakānāṃ mahad vanam // RamS_2,16.51 //
GE09ram_02su:1042: bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā /
GE09ram_02su:1043: tathā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // RamS_2,16.52 //
GE09ram_02su:1044: sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02su:1045: śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam // RamS_2,16.53 //
GE09ram_02su:1046: vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:1047: kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ // RamS_2,16.54 //
GE09ram_02su:1048: sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02su:1049: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam // RamS_2,16.55 //
GE09ram_02su:1053: śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan // RamS_2,16.57 //
GE09ram_02su:1055: lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā // RamS_2,16.58 //
GE09ram_02su:1056: na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:1058: dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca /
GE09ram_02su:1060: praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām /
GE09ram_02su:1061: na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā //
GE09ram_02su:1063: rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1064: jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // RamS_2,17.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1066: upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn // RamS_2,17.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1067: praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1069: praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1070: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // RamS_2,17.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1071: vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1072: nyavedayanta tvaritā rāmamātuḥ priyaṃ tadā // RamS_2,17.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1073: kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā /
GE09ram_02su:1074: prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // RamS_2,17.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1076: agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // RamS_2,17.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1077: praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:1078: dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam // RamS_2,17.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1080: abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍabā yathā // RamS_2,17.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1081: tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1082: kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,17.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1084: prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // RamS_2,17.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1086: adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,17.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1088: sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ // RamS_2,17.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1089: devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:1090: idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // RamS_2,17.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1091: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane /
GE09ram_02su:1092: madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam // RamS_2,17.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1094: māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasam // RamS_2,17.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1095: tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva /
GE09ram_02su:1101: yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1102: na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // RamS_2,17.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1103: eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1104: aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate // RamS_2,17.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1105: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe /
GE09ram_02su:1106: api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // RamS_2,17.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1108: ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī /
GE09ram_02su:1109: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,17.23 //*
GE09ram_02su:1110: tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:1111: kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me // RamS_2,17.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1112: yo hi māṃ sevate kaścid atha vāpy anuvartate /
GE09ram_02su:1113: kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // RamS_2,17.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1114: daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1116: upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1117: duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // RamS_2,17.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1118: sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate /
GE09ram_02su:1119: prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā // RamS_2,17.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1120: mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama /
GE09ram_02su:1121: yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva //
GE09ram_02su:1122: sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate /
GE09ram_02su:1123: anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate //
GE09ram_02su:1124: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi /
GE09ram_02su:1125: tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare //
GE09ram_02su:1126: yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā labheta kaścid guruduḥkhakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1127: gatāham adyaiva paretasaṃsadaṃ vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai //
GE09ram_02su:1128: bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:1129: vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī //
GE09ram_02su:1131: tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram /
GE09ram_02su:1132: uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,18.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1133: na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1134: tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,18.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1135: viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1136: nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // RamS_2,18.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1138: yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,18.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1139: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1140: amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet // RamS_2,18.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1141: devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam /
GE09ram_02su:1142: avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt // RamS_2,18.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1143: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1144: putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // RamS_2,18.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1145: yāvad eva na jānāti kaścid artham imaṃ naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1146: tāvad eva mayā sārdham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // RamS_2,18.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1147: mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1148: kaḥ samartho 'dhikaṃ kartuṃ kṛtāntasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ // RamS_2,18.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1150: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // RamS_2,18.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1151: bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati /
GE09ram_02su:1152: sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // RamS_2,18.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1153: tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam /
GE09ram_02su:1154: kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana // RamS_2,18.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1156: satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // RamS_2,18.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1157: dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate /
GE09ram_02su:1158: praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // RamS_2,18.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1159: harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1160: devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // RamS_2,18.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1161: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1162: uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā // RamS_2,18.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1163: bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:1164: yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // RamS_2,18.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1165: na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:1166: vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // RamS_2,18.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1167: dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:1168: śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // RamS_2,18.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1169: śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan /
GE09ram_02su:1170: pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,18.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1171: yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham /
GE09ram_02su:1172: tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // RamS_2,18.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1173: tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā /
GE09ram_02su:1174: tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // RamS_2,18.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1175: yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām /
GE09ram_02su:1176: ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // RamS_2,18.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1177: tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam /
GE09ram_02su:1178: brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // RamS_2,18.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1179: vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1180: uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // RamS_2,18.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1181: nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:1182: prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // RamS_2,18.26 //
GE09ram_02su:1183: ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā /
GE09ram_02su:1184: gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // RamS_2,18.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1185: asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1186: khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // RamS_2,18.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1189: na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam /
GE09ram_02su:1190: pūrvair ayam abhipreto gato mārgo 'nugamyate // RamS_2,18.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1191: tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā /
GE09ram_02su:1192: pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaścin nāma hīyate // RamS_2,18.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1193: tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1194: tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam /
GE09ram_02su:1195: abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // RamS_2,18.32 //*
GE09ram_02su:1196: dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_02su:1197: dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // RamS_2,18.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1198: saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:1199: na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // RamS_2,18.34 //
GE09ram_02su:1200: so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum /
GE09ram_02su:1201: pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // RamS_2,18.35 //
GE09ram_02su:1203: dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // RamS_2,18.36 //
GE09ram_02su:1204: tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1205: uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ // RamS_2,18.37 //
GE09ram_02su:1206: anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1207: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me /
GE09ram_02su:1208: tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // RamS_2,18.38 //*
GE09ram_02su:1209: yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam /
GE09ram_02su:1210: adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ //
GE09ram_02su:1211: prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_02su:1212: athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam //
GE09ram_02su:1214: atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:1216: āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:1217: uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // RamS_2,19.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1221: mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // RamS_2,19.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1222: tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe /
GE09ram_02su:1225: mātḥṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // RamS_2,19.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1227: paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama // RamS_2,19.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1228: tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte /
GE09ram_02su:1229: satyaṃ neti manastāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // RamS_2,19.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1231: anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // RamS_2,19.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1233: sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ // RamS_2,19.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1235: gate 'raṇyaṃ ca kaikeyyā bhaviṣyati manaḥsukham // RamS_2,19.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1236: buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam /
GE09ram_02su:1237: tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // RamS_2,19.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1238: kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane /
GE09ram_02su:1239: rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // RamS_2,19.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1240: kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane /
GE09ram_02su:1241: yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // RamS_2,19.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1242: jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram /
GE09ram_02su:1243: bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // RamS_2,19.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1245: ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // RamS_2,19.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1247: brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // RamS_2,19.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1248: yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate /
GE09ram_02su:1249: vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // RamS_2,19.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1250: kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān /
GE09ram_02su:1251: yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // RamS_2,19.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1253: yasya kiṃcit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // RamS_2,19.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1254: vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate /
GE09ram_02su:1255: tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām /
GE09ram_02su:1257: na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā /
GE09ram_02su:1258: daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam //
GE09ram_02su:1260: iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1261: śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ // RamS_2,20.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1262: tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1263: niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // RamS_2,20.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1265: babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // RamS_2,20.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1266: agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1267: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // RamS_2,20.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1268: agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1269: asthāne sambhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // RamS_2,20.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1271: kathaṃ hy etad asambhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // RamS_2,20.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1273: kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // RamS_2,20.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1274: pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate /
GE09ram_02su:1275: santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // RamS_2,20.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1277: yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate /
GE09ram_02su:1278: sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // RamS_2,20.9 //*
GE09ram_02su:1279: yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam /
GE09ram_02su:1280: tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // RamS_2,20.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1281: viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate /
GE09ram_02su:1282: vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate // RamS_2,20.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1284: na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati // RamS_2,20.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1285: drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:1286: daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,20.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1287: adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1288: yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,20.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1290: pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye // RamS_2,20.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1292: na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // RamS_2,20.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1293: yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1294: araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // RamS_2,20.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1295: ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava /
GE09ram_02su:1297: madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:1298: prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama // RamS_2,20.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1300: āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi // RamS_2,20.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1302: prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane // RamS_2,20.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1304: naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // RamS_2,20.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1305: pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk /
GE09ram_02su:1306: rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // RamS_2,20.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1307: maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava /
GE09ram_02su:1308: aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // RamS_2,20.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1309: na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me /
GE09ram_02su:1312: na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // RamS_2,20.26 //
GE09ram_02su:1314: pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // RamS_2,20.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1318: patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // RamS_2,20.29 //
GE09ram_02su:1320: kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // RamS_2,20.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1321: bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān /
GE09ram_02su:1324: rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // RamS_2,20.32 //
GE09ram_02su:1326: vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // RamS_2,20.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1327: anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1329: bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1330: yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ //
GE09ram_02su:1331: vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1332: uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:1334: taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane /
GE09ram_02su:1335: kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt // RamS_2,21.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1337: mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // RamS_2,21.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1338: yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate /
GE09ram_02su:1339: kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // RamS_2,21.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1340: ka etacchraddadhecchrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam /
GE09ram_02su:1341: guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // RamS_2,21.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1342: tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:1343: pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye // RamS_2,21.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1344: kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati /
GE09ram_02su:1345: ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi // RamS_2,21.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1346: tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1347: śrutvā rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // RamS_2,21.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1348: kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:1349: bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // RamS_2,21.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1350: bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1351: sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // RamS_2,21.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1352: yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1353: śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // RamS_2,21.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1354: evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubhadarśanā /
GE09ram_02su:1355: tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam // RamS_2,21.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1356: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1357: bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // RamS_2,21.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1358: mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1359: rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // RamS_2,21.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1360: imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:1361: varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava // RamS_2,21.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1362: evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā /
GE09ram_02su:1363: uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā // RamS_2,21.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1364: āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam /
GE09ram_02su:1365: naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyāṃ mṛgīṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02su:1366: yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // RamS_2,21.16 //*
GE09ram_02su:1367: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1368: jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:1369: bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // RamS_2,21.17 //*
GE09ram_02su:1371: bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // RamS_2,21.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1372: yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1373: śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃcid apramattā tathā kuru // RamS_2,21.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1375: bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet // RamS_2,21.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1376: śuśrūṣām eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā /
GE09ram_02su:1377: eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ // RamS_2,21.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1378: pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1380: prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati /
GE09ram_02su:1381: yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam // RamS_2,21.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1384: gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho // RamS_2,21.24 //*
GE09ram_02su:1385: tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā /
GE09ram_02su:1386: uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī //
GE09ram_02su:1388: sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci /
GE09ram_02su:1389: cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī // RamS_2,22.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1390: svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1391: svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā // RamS_2,22.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1392: ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1393: dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā // RamS_2,22.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1394: smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1395: skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ // RamS_2,22.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1396: saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1397: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1399: plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane /
GE09ram_02su:1400: sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava // RamS_2,22.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1401: mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1402: mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka // RamS_2,22.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1404: mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā sampūjitās tv iha // RamS_2,22.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1405: āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1406: sarvasampattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka // RamS_2,22.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1407: svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1408: sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ // RamS_2,22.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1410: ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam // RamS_2,22.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1411: iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:1414: vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // RamS_2,22.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1416: amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // RamS_2,22.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1418: cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca // RamS_2,22.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1420: avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham // RamS_2,22.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1422: paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani // RamS_2,22.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1424: abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava //
GE09ram_02su:1425: itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02su:1426: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje //
GE09ram_02su:1427: tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1428: jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā //
GE09ram_02su:1430: abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1431: kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ // RamS_2,23.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1434: vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:1435: tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,23.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1436: devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā /
GE09ram_02su:1440: atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim /
GE09ram_02su:1443: āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho // RamS_2,23.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1444: adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1445: procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ // RamS_2,23.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1450: vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvāṃ nararṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:1451: stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ // RamS_2,23.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1452: na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1453: mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ // RamS_2,23.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1454: na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1457: mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ // RamS_2,23.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1458: na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1460: na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana /
GE09ram_02su:1462: abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:1463: apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate // RamS_2,23.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1465: sīte tatrabhavāṃs tātaḥ pravrājayati māṃ vanam // RamS_2,23.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1467: śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama // RamS_2,23.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1469: kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau // RamS_2,23.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1471: pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ // RamS_2,23.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1472: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā /
GE09ram_02su:1473: pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1474: so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam // RamS_2,23.22 //*
GE09ram_02su:1475: bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:1476: ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam /
GE09ram_02su:1477: tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama // RamS_2,23.23 //*
GE09ram_02su:1478: nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:1479: anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum // RamS_2,23.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1480: ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan /
GE09ram_02su:1481: vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini // RamS_2,23.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1482: yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam /
GE09ram_02su:1484: kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02su:1485: vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ // RamS_2,23.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1486: mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā /
GE09ram_02su:1487: dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ sammānam arhati // RamS_2,23.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1488: vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1489: snehapraṇayasambhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ // RamS_2,23.29 //
GE09ram_02su:1491: tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama // RamS_2,23.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1492: vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:1493: sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca // RamS_2,23.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1496: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1497: samarthān sampragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ // RamS_2,23.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1498: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:1499: yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasyacit tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama //
GE09ram_02su:1501: evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī /
GE09ram_02su:1502: praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt // RamS_2,24.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1503: āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā /
GE09ram_02su:1504: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate // RamS_2,24.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1505: bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:1506: ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api // RamS_2,24.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1507: na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1508: iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā // RamS_2,24.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1509: yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1510: agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān // RamS_2,24.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1512: naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate // RamS_2,24.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1515: anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam /
