GE09ram_02su:2940: tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm // RamS_2,49.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2942: vivṛddhaṃ bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śyāmaṃ siddhopasevitam // RamS_2,49.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2943: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam /
GE09ram_02su:2944: palāśabadarīmiśraṃ rāma vaṃśaiś ca yāmunaiḥ // RamS_2,49.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2945: sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā /
GE09ram_02su:2947: iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata // RamS_2,49.6 //*
GE09ram_02su:2948: upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2949: kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate // RamS_2,49.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2951: sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm // RamS_2,49.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2953: cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukham āsanam // RamS_2,49.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2954: tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām /
GE09ram_02su:2955: īṣat saṃlajjamānāṃ tām adhyāropayata plavam // RamS_2,49.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2957: tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm // RamS_2,49.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2958: te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt /
GE09ram_02su:2959: śyāmaṃ nyagrodham āseduḥ śītalaṃ haritacchadam // RamS_2,49.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2960: kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:2961: iti sītāñjaliṃ kṛtvā paryagacchad vanaspatim // RamS_2,49.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2963: bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane // RamS_2,49.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2964: vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute /
GE09ram_02su:2965: samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:2969: saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam /
GE09ram_02su:2971: sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2972: jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam // RamS_2,50.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2973: tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam /
GE09ram_02su:2974: panthānam ṛṣiṇoddiṣṭaṃ citrakūṭasya taṃ yayuḥ // RamS_2,50.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2975: tataḥ samprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02su:2976: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,50.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2977: ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān /
GE09ram_02su:2978: svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye // RamS_2,50.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2980: phalapattrair avanatān nūnaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum // RamS_2,50.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2982: madhūni madhukārībhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni nage nage // RamS_2,50.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2983: eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati /
GE09ram_02su:2986: citrakūṭam imaṃ paśya pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim // RamS_2,50.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2987: tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:2988: ramyam āsedatuḥ śailaṃ citrakūṭaṃ manoramam // RamS_2,50.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2990: ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi // RamS_2,50.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2991: lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:2992: kuruṣvāvasathaṃ saumya vāse me 'bhirataṃ manaḥ // RamS_2,50.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2993: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:2994: ājahāra tataś cakre parṇaśālām ariṃdamaḥ // RamS_2,50.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2996: aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam // RamS_2,50.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2997: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02su:2998: atha cikṣepa saumitriḥ samiddhe jātavedasi // RamS_2,50.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2999: taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam /
GE09ram_02su:3000: lakṣmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghram atha rāghavam abravīt // RamS_2,50.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3001: ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgo yathā /
GE09ram_02su:3002: devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi // RamS_2,50.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3003: rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3004: pāpasaṃśamanaṃ rāmaś cakāra balim uttamam // RamS_2,50.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3005: tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇacchadanāṃ manojñāṃ yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām /
GE09ram_02su:3006: vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ sabhāṃ yathā devagaṇāḥ sudharmām //
GE09ram_02su:3008: vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:3009: suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām /
GE09ram_02su:3010: nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt //
GE09ram_02su:3013: rāme dakṣiṇakūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ // RamS_2,51.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3015: ayodhyām eva nagarīṃ prayayau gāḍhadurmanāḥ // RamS_2,51.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3016: sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:3017: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca // RamS_2,51.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3019: ayodhyāṃ samanuprāpya nirānandāṃ dadarśa ha // RamS_2,51.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3020: sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3022: kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā /
GE09ram_02su:3024: iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha // RamS_2,51.6 //*
GE09ram_02su:3026: kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ // RamS_2,51.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3027: teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:3029: te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3030: aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ // RamS_2,51.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3031: śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02su:3032: hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam // RamS_2,51.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3034: na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā // RamS_2,51.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3035: kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:3036: iti rāmeṇa nagaraṃ pitṛvat paripālitam // RamS_2,51.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3040: yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham // RamS_2,51.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3041: so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca /
GE09ram_02su:3045: saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3046: sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati // RamS_2,51.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3047: yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam /
GE09ram_02su:3048: ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati // RamS_2,51.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3049: satyarūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan /
GE09ram_02su:3050: pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham // RamS_2,51.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3051: sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam āturam /
GE09ram_02su:3053: abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:3055: sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrāntacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3058: uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau // RamS_2,51.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3059: sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim /
GE09ram_02su:3060: utthāpayāmāsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,51.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3062: vanavāsād anuprāptaṃ kasmān na pratibhāṣase // RamS_2,51.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3064: uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā // RamS_2,51.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3065: deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim /
GE09ram_02su:3066: neha tiṣṭhati kaikeyī viśrabdhaṃ pratibhāṣyatām // RamS_2,51.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3069: evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:3070: patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // RamS_2,51.29 //
GE09ram_02su:3071: tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3072: striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam //
GE09ram_02su:3074: pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3077: viniḥśvasantaṃ dhyāyantam asvastham iva kuñjaram // RamS_2,52.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3078: rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:3080: kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3082: bhūmipālātmajo bhūmau śete katham anāthavat // RamS_2,52.4 //*
GE09ram_02su:3084: sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ // RamS_2,52.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3086: kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau // RamS_2,52.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3088: rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau // RamS_2,52.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3089: siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau /
GE09ram_02su:3090: vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram // RamS_2,52.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3091: kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3092: sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī /
GE09ram_02su:3093: āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya // RamS_2,52.9 //*
GE09ram_02su:3097: añjaliṃ rāghavaḥ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca // RamS_2,52.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3099: śirasā vandanīyasya vandyau pādau mahātmanaḥ // RamS_2,52.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3100: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta madvacanāt tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:3102: mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam /
GE09ram_02su:3103: devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya // RamS_2,52.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3104: bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca /
GE09ram_02su:3105: sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu // RamS_2,52.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3108: ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3109: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat // RamS_2,52.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3110: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:3114: rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye // RamS_2,52.19 //*
GE09ram_02su:3118: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,52.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3124: tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃcid abravīt // RamS_2,52.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3126: mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā // RamS_2,52.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3128: tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām //
GE09ram_02su:3130: mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani /
GE09ram_02su:3131: uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme samprasthite vanam // RamS_2,53.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3133: prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan // RamS_2,53.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3134: guhena sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn /
GE09ram_02su:3135: āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti // RamS_2,53.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3138: na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca /
GE09ram_02su:3139: rāmaśokābhibhūtaṃ tan niṣkūjam abhavad vanam // RamS_2,53.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3142: jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:3143: nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram // RamS_2,53.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3144: praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaścid abhinandati /
GE09ram_02su:3145: narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ // RamS_2,53.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3146: harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:3149: anyonyam abhivīkṣante vyaktam ārtatarāḥ striyaḥ // RamS_2,53.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3151: aham ārtatayā kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye // RamS_2,53.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3155: kausalyā putrahīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā // RamS_2,53.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3157: bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt // RamS_2,53.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3159: mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam // RamS_2,53.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3160: na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3161: mayāyam arthaḥ sammohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ // RamS_2,53.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3162: bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02su:3163: kulasyāsya vināśāya prāptaṃ sūta yadṛcchayā // RamS_2,53.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3164: sūta yady asti te kiṃcin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3165: tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // RamS_2,53.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3166: yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:3167: na śakṣyāmi vinā rāmaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // RamS_2,53.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3168: atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:3169: mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya // RamS_2,53.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3171: yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā // RamS_2,53.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3173: rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // RamS_2,53.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3174: ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam /
GE09ram_02su:3175: imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam // RamS_2,53.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3176: hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvini /
GE09ram_02su:3177: na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat /
GE09ram_02su:3178: dustaro jīvatā devi mayāyaṃ śokasāgaraḥ // RamS_2,53.24 //*
GE09ram_02su:3179: aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_02su:3180: itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:3181: iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3182: vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā //
GE09ram_02su:3185: dharaṇyāṃ gatasattveva kausalyā sūtam abravīt // RamS_2,54.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3186: naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3187: tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham // RamS_2,54.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3188: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api /
GE09ram_02su:3189: atha tān nānugacchāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // RamS_2,54.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3191: idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // RamS_2,54.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3192: tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca sambhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:3193: vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,54.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3194: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane /
GE09ram_02su:3196: vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva /
GE09ram_02su:3198: nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:3199: uciteva pravāsānāṃ vaidehī pratibhāti mā // RamS_2,54.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3200: nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā /
GE09ram_02su:3201: tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api // RamS_2,54.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3203: rāmā rāme hy adhīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī // RamS_2,54.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3204: tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tadadhīnaṃ ca jīvitam /
GE09ram_02su:3205: ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāmahīnā tathā vanam // RamS_2,54.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3206: pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:3207: gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api // RamS_2,54.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3209: na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā // RamS_2,54.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3211: vadanaṃ tadvadānyāyā vaidehyā na vikampate // RamS_2,54.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3215: idānīm api vaidehī tadrāgā nyastabhūṣaṇā // RamS_2,54.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3216: gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā /
GE09ram_02su:3217: nāhārayati saṃtrāsaṃ bāhū rāmasya saṃśritā // RamS_2,54.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3218: na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3219: idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam // RamS_2,54.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3220: vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3221: vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te //
GE09ram_02su:3223: na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca //
GE09ram_02su:3225: vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare /
GE09ram_02su:3226: kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt // RamS_2,55.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3227: yadyapi triṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3228: sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,55.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3229: kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:3230: duḥkhitau sukhasaṃvṛddhau vane duḥkhaṃ sahiṣyataḥ // RamS_2,55.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3231: sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā /
GE09ram_02su:3232: katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate // RamS_2,55.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3234: vanyaṃ naivāram āhāraṃ kathaṃ sītopabhokṣyate // RamS_2,55.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3236: kathaṃ kravyādasiṃhānāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty aśobhanam // RamS_2,55.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3240: kadā drakṣyāmi rāmasya vadanaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇam // RamS_2,55.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3241: vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3242: apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā // RamS_2,55.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3243: yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:3244: jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate // RamS_2,55.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3245: evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate /
GE09ram_02su:3246: bhrātā jyeṣṭho variṣṭhaś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate // RamS_2,55.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3247: na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:3248: evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate // RamS_2,55.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3249: havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3250: naitāni yātayāmāni kurvanti punar adhvare // RamS_2,55.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3251: tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva /
GE09ram_02su:3252: nābhimantum alaṃ rāmo naṣṭasomam ivādhvaram // RamS_2,55.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3254: balavān iva śārdūlo vāladher abhimarśanam // RamS_2,55.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3256: svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā // RamS_2,55.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3258: yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite // RamS_2,55.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3259: gatir ekā patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3260: tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate // RamS_2,55.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3261: tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3262: na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā // RamS_2,55.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3263: hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca /
GE09ram_02su:3264: hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau //
GE09ram_02su:3265: imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3266: tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat //
GE09ram_02su:3268: evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā /
GE09ram_02su:3269: śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ // RamS_2,56.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3271: yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā // RamS_2,56.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3272: amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3273: dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ // RamS_2,56.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3275: vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api // RamS_2,56.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3276: bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā /
GE09ram_02su:3277: dharmaṃ vimṛśamānānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ devi daivatam // RamS_2,56.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3279: nārhase vipriyaṃ vaktuṃ duḥkhitāpi suduḥkhitam // RamS_2,56.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3280: tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:3281: kausalyā vyasṛjad bāṣpaṃ praṇālīva navodakam // RamS_2,56.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3282: sa mūrdhni baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim /
GE09ram_02su:3283: sambhramād abravīt trastā tvaramāṇākṣaraṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,56.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3284: prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nipatitāsmi te /
GE09ram_02su:3285: yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā // RamS_2,56.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3286: naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:3287: ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate // RamS_2,56.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3288: jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam /
GE09ram_02su:3289: putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam // RamS_2,56.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3290: śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam /
GE09ram_02su:3291: śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // RamS_2,56.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3293: soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate // RamS_2,56.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3296: taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate /
GE09ram_02su:3297: adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat // RamS_2,56.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3298: evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3299: mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata // RamS_2,56.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3300: atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3301: śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān // RamS_2,56.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3304: atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata // RamS_2,57.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3306: āviveśopasargas taṃ tamaḥ sūryam ivāsuram // RamS_2,57.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3307: sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam /
GE09ram_02su:3309: kausalyāṃ putraśokārtām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,57.3 //*
GE09ram_02su:3310: yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GE09ram_02su:3311: tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ // RamS_2,57.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3313: doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate // RamS_2,57.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3314: kaścid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati /
GE09ram_02su:3315: puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // RamS_2,57.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3316: so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam /
GE09ram_02su:3317: rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // RamS_2,57.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3319: kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3320: tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // RamS_2,57.8 //*
GE09ram_02su:3321: sammohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam /
GE09ram_02su:3322: evaṃ mamāpy avijñātaṃ śabdavedhyamayaṃ phalam // RamS_2,57.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3323: devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:3325: upāsya hi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3326: paretācaritāṃ bhīmāṃ ravir āviśate diśam // RamS_2,57.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3327: uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3331: tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī /
GE09ram_02su:3333: nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:3334: anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃcij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // RamS_2,57.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3335: athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3336: acakṣur viṣaye ghoṣaṃ vāraṇasyeva nardataḥ // RamS_2,57.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3338: amuñcaṃ niśitaṃ bāṇam aham āśīviṣopamam // RamS_2,57.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3339: tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd vanaukasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3340: hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī /
GE09ram_02su:3341: katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini // RamS_2,57.18 //*
GE09ram_02su:3343: iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // RamS_2,57.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3344: ṛṣer hi nyastadaṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3345: kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate // RamS_2,57.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3347: ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā // RamS_2,57.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3349: na kaścit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam // RamS_2,57.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3351: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ cobhāv anuśocāmi madvidhe // RamS_2,57.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3352: tad etan mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:3353: mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati // RamS_2,57.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3354: vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3355: kena sma nihatāḥ sarve subālenākṛtātmanā // RamS_2,57.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3356: tāṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3357: karābhyāṃ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ vyathitasyāpatad bhuvi // RamS_2,57.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3358: taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3359: apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam // RamS_2,57.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3360: sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasam /
GE09ram_02su:3361: ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā // RamS_2,57.28 //
GE09ram_02su:3362: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:3363: jihīrṣur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā // RamS_2,57.29 //
GE09ram_02su:3364: ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi /
GE09ram_02su:3365: dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me // RamS_2,57.30 //
GE09ram_02su:3366: tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau /
GE09ram_02su:3367: ciram āśākṛtāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ kaṣṭāṃ saṃdhārayiṣyataḥ // RamS_2,57.31 //
GE09ram_02su:3368: na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:3369: pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi // RamS_2,57.32 //
GE09ram_02su:3370: jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3371: bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam // RamS_2,57.33 //
GE09ram_02su:3372: pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:3373: na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ // RamS_2,57.34 //
GE09ram_02su:3374: iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3375: taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet // RamS_2,57.35 //
GE09ram_02su:3376: viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3377: ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā // RamS_2,57.36 //
GE09ram_02su:3378: na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā /
GE09ram_02su:3379: śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa // RamS_2,57.37 //
GE09ram_02su:3381: tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam // RamS_2,57.38 //
GE09ram_02su:3382: jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchrān marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchvasantam /
GE09ram_02su:3383: tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:3385: tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3386: ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet // RamS_2,58.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3387: tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādāya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā /
GE09ram_02su:3388: āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,58.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3390: apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau // RamS_2,58.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3392: tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat // RamS_2,58.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3393: padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:3394: kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya // RamS_2,58.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3395: yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:3396: utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam // RamS_2,58.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3397: yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:3398: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā // RamS_2,58.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3399: tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām /
GE09ram_02su:3400: samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃcin nau nābhibhāṣase // RamS_2,58.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3401: munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā /
GE09ram_02su:3402: hīnavyañjanayā prekṣya bhīto bhīta ivābruvam // RamS_2,58.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3404: ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam // RamS_2,58.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3406: sajjanāvamataṃ duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmajam // RamS_2,58.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3408: jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃcin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam // RamS_2,58.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3409: tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3410: dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā // RamS_2,58.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3411: gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi /
GE09ram_02su:3412: vinirbhinnaṃ gataprāṇaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi tāpasam // RamS_2,58.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3414: visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,58.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3415: sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3416: bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca // RamS_2,58.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3418: śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ // RamS_2,58.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3419: sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3420: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // RamS_2,58.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3421: yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:3422: phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā // RamS_2,58.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3424: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam // RamS_2,58.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3425: ajñānāddhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi /
GE09ram_02su:3426: api hy adya kulaṃ na syād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān // RamS_2,58.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3427: naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:3428: adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam // RamS_2,58.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3430: śayānaṃ bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaṃ dharmarājavaśaṃ gatam // RamS_2,58.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3431: athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau /
GE09ram_02su:3432: asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā // RamS_2,58.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3433: tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau /
GE09ram_02su:3434: nipetatuḥ śarīre 'sya pitā cāsyedam abravīt // RamS_2,58.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3435: na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika /
GE09ram_02su:3436: kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada // RamS_2,58.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3438: adhīyānasya madhuraṃ śāstraṃ vānyad viśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,58.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3439: ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3441: kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim /
GE09ram_02su:3443: imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:3444: kathaṃ putra bhariṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragardhinīm // RamS_2,58.30 //
GE09ram_02su:3445: tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:3446: śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ // RamS_2,58.31 //
GE09ram_02su:3447: ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane /
GE09ram_02su:3448: kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam // RamS_2,58.32 //
GE09ram_02su:3449: tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm /
GE09ram_02su:3450: kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam // RamS_2,58.33 //
GE09ram_02su:3452: tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām // RamS_2,58.34 //
GE09ram_02su:3453: yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3454: hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja // RamS_2,58.35 //
GE09ram_02su:3455: yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3456: nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka // RamS_2,58.36 //
GE09ram_02su:3457: yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt tapasā ca yā /
GE09ram_02su:3460: dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka /
GE09ram_02su:3461: na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim // RamS_2,58.38 //*
GE09ram_02su:3463: tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā // RamS_2,58.39 //
GE09ram_02su:3464: sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3465: āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,58.40 //
GE09ram_02su:3466: sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02su:3467: bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ // RamS_2,58.41 //
GE09ram_02su:3468: evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā /
GE09ram_02su:3469: āruroha divaṃ kṣipraṃ muniputro jitendriyaḥ // RamS_2,58.42 //
GE09ram_02su:3470: sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā /
GE09ram_02su:3471: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // RamS_2,58.43 //
GE09ram_02su:3472: adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā /
GE09ram_02su:3473: yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam // RamS_2,58.44 //
GE09ram_02su:3474: tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3475: tena tvām abhiśapsyāmi suduḥkham atidāruṇam // RamS_2,58.45 //
GE09ram_02su:3476: putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam /
GE09ram_02su:3477: evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi // RamS_2,58.46 //
GE09ram_02su:3478: tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3479: yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam // RamS_2,58.47 //
GE09ram_02su:3480: yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā /
GE09ram_02su:3481: na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam // RamS_2,58.48 //
GE09ram_02su:3482: cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate /
GE09ram_02su:3483: dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām // RamS_2,58.49 //
GE09ram_02su:3484: atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:3485: na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // RamS_2,58.50 //
GE09ram_02su:3486: na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam /
GE09ram_02su:3487: mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // RamS_2,58.51 //
GE09ram_02su:3489: dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham // RamS_2,58.52 //
GE09ram_02su:3491: sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham // RamS_2,58.53 //
GE09ram_02su:3493: drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā // RamS_2,58.54 //
GE09ram_02su:3494: ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam /
GE09ram_02su:3495: saṃsādayati vegena yathā kūlaṃ nadīrayaḥ // RamS_2,58.55 //
GE09ram_02su:3497: rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat // RamS_2,58.56 //
GE09ram_02su:3498: tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3499: gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:3508: upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārībahulāḥ striyaḥ // RamS_2,59.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3510: tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // RamS_2,59.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3511: tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3513: atha saṃvepamānānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:3514: yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // RamS_2,59.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3515: tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3518: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // RamS_2,59.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3519: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:3520: hā nātheti parikruśya petatur dharaṇītale // RamS_2,59.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3522: na babhrāja rajodhvastā tāreva gaganacyutā // RamS_2,59.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3526: babhūva naradevasya sadma diṣṭāntam īyuṣaḥ // RamS_2,59.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3527: atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3528: bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat //
GE09ram_02su:3530: tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam /
GE09ram_02su:3531: hataprabham ivādityaṃ svargasthaṃ prekṣya bhūmipam // RamS_2,60.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3533: upagṛhya śiro rājñaḥ kaikeyīṃ pratyabhāṣata // RamS_2,60.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3534: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:3535: tyaktvā rājānam ekāgrā nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi // RamS_2,60.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3536: vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama /
GE09ram_02su:3537: vipathe sārthahīneva nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // RamS_2,60.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3538: bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3539: icchej jīvitum anyatra kaikeyyās tyaktadharmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,60.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3540: na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan /
GE09ram_02su:3541: kubjānimittaṃ kaikeyyā rāghavāṇāṃ kulaṃ hatam // RamS_2,60.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3543: sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā paritapsyaty ahaṃ yathā // RamS_2,60.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3548: niśamya nūnaṃ saṃtrastā rāghavaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // RamS_2,60.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3550: so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam // RamS_2,60.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3554: rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // RamS_2,60.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3555: na tu saṃkālanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3556: sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam // RamS_2,60.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3557: tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam /
GE09ram_02su:3558: hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan // RamS_2,60.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3562: purī nārājatāyodhyā hīnā rājñā mahātmanā // RamS_2,60.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3565: gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī /
GE09ram_02su:3566: purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā //
GE09ram_02su:3567: narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram /
GE09ram_02su:3568: tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire //
GE09ram_02su:3571: sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ // RamS_2,61.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3573: kātyāyano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ // RamS_2,61.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3574: ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan /
GE09ram_02su:3576: atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā /
GE09ram_02su:3577: asmin pañcatvam āpanne putraśokena pārthive // RamS_2,61.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3578: svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3579: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha // RamS_2,61.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3583: arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt // RamS_2,61.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3585: abhivarṣati parjanyo mahīṃ divyena vāriṇā // RamS_2,61.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3587: nārājake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe // RamS_2,61.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3588: arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake /
GE09ram_02su:3589: idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake // RamS_2,61.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3591: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca // RamS_2,61.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3593: sattrāṇy anvāsate dāntā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // RamS_2,61.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3595: utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ // RamS_2,61.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3599: narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ // RamS_2,61.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3605: bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ yatra sāyaṃgṛho muniḥ // RamS_2,61.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3607: na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi // RamS_2,61.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3608: yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam /
GE09ram_02su:3609: agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam // RamS_2,61.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3611: matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam // RamS_2,61.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3614: aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana /
GE09ram_02su:3615: rājā cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // RamS_2,61.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3616: jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam /
GE09ram_02su:3617: nātikramāmahe sarve velāṃ prāpyeva sāgaraḥ // RamS_2,61.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3618: sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam /
GE09ram_02su:3619: kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñca // RamS_2,61.25
GE09ram_02su:3621: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:3622: mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,62.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3623: yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī /
GE09ram_02su:3624: bharato vasati bhrātrā śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // RamS_2,62.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3625: tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3626: ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam // RamS_2,62.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3627: gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan /
GE09ram_02su:3628: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,62.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3630: śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ // RamS_2,62.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3631: puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3632: tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama // RamS_2,62.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3633: purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3634: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // RamS_2,62.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3635: mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3636: bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam // RamS_2,62.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3637: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:3638: kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata /
GE09ram_02su:3640: te hastinapure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3645: abhigamyābhivādyaṃ taṃ kuliṅgāṃ prāviśan purīm // RamS_2,62.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3647: yayur madhyena vāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam /
GE09ram_02su:3648: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm // RamS_2,62.13 //*
GE09ram_02su:3649: te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā /
GE09ram_02su:3650: girivrajaṃ puravaraṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā // RamS_2,62.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3651: bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham /
GE09ram_02su:3652: aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:3654: yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02su:3655: bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ // RamS_2,63.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3656: vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:3659: āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // RamS_2,63.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3660: vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare /
GE09ram_02su:3661: nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // RamS_2,63.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3662: sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3663: goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,63.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3664: tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3665: suhṛdbhiḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kiṃ sakhe nānumodase // RamS_2,63.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3666: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:3667: śṛṇu tvaṃ yannimittaṃ me dainyam etad upāgatam // RamS_2,63.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3670: plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade /
GE09ram_02su:3671: pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ // RamS_2,63.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3672: tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3674: svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:3675: sahasā cāpi saṃśāntaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasam // RamS_2,63.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3676: avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:3677: ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva parvatān // RamS_2,63.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3679: prahasanti sma rājānaṃ pramadāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ // RamS_2,63.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3682: evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām /
GE09ram_02su:3683: ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati // RamS_2,63.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3684: naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi /
GE09ram_02su:3686: etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye // RamS_2,63.16 //*
GE09ram_02su:3687: śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3688: jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam // RamS_2,63.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3689: imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā /
GE09ram_02su:3690: bhayaṃ mahat taddhṛdayān na yāti me vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam //
GE09ram_02su:3692: bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3694: samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3695: rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,64.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3696: purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3697: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // RamS_2,64.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3698: atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te /
GE09ram_02su:3699: daśakoṭyas tu sampūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja // RamS_2,64.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3700: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane /
GE09ram_02su:3701: dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ sampratipūjya tān // RamS_2,64.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3702: kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama /
GE09ram_02su:3703: kaccic cārogatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani // RamS_2,64.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3705: arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // RamS_2,64.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3706: kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā /
GE09ram_02su:3707: śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā // RamS_2,64.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3709: arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha // RamS_2,64.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3710: evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:3711: ūcuḥ sampraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:3712: kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // RamS_2,64.10 //*
GE09ram_02su:3713: bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:3714: āpṛcche 'haṃ mahārājaṃ dūtāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // RamS_2,64.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3715: evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3716: dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha // RamS_2,64.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3718: punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi // RamS_2,64.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3719: bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:3720: tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam // RamS_2,64.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3721: gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:3722: mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa // RamS_2,64.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3723: purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3724: tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // RamS_2,64.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3725: tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca /
GE09ram_02su:3726: abhisatkṛtya kaikeyo bharatāya dhanaṃ dadau // RamS_2,64.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3728: satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat // RamS_2,64.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3732: kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau // RamS_2,64.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3734: daṃṣṭrāyudhān mahākāyāñ śunaś copāyanaṃ dadau // RamS_2,64.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3735: sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam /
GE09ram_02su:3736: ratham āruhya bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // RamS_2,64.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3738: uṣṭrago'śvakharair bhṛtyā bharataṃ yāntam anvayuḥ // RamS_2,64.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3739: balena gupto bharato mahātmā sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3740: ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt //
GE09ram_02su:3744: śatadrūm atarac chrīmān nadīm ikṣvākunandanaḥ // RamS_2,65.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3746: śilām ākurvatīṃ tīrtvā āgneyaṃ śalyakartanam // RamS_2,65.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3748: atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati // RamS_2,65.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3750: yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā // RamS_2,65.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3751: śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3752: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam // RamS_2,65.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3754: bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt // RamS_2,65.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3756: varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ // RamS_2,65.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3757: tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau /
GE09ram_02su:3758: udyānam ujjihānāyāḥ priyakā yatra pādapāḥ // RamS_2,65.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3759: sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3760: anujñāpyātha bharato vāhinīṃ tvarito yayau // RamS_2,65.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3761: vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānikāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:3762: anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ // RamS_2,65.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3764: tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm /
GE09ram_02su:3765: ekasāle sthāṇumatīṃ vinate gomatīṃ nadīm // RamS_2,65.11 //*
GE09ram_02su:3769: ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha // RamS_2,65.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3771: ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt // RamS_2,65.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3773: ayodhyā dṛśyate dūrāt sārathe pāṇḍumṛttikā // RamS_2,65.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3776: ayodhyāyāṃ purā śabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:3777: samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham // RamS_2,65.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3781: araṇyabhūteva purī sārathe pratibhāti me // RamS_2,65.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3782: na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3783: niryānto vābhiyānto vā naramukhyā yathāpuram // RamS_2,65.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3784: aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:3785: nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati me manaḥ // RamS_2,65.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3787: dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau // RamS_2,65.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3788: sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:3789: sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,65.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3790: śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane /
GE09ram_02su:3791: ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe // RamS_2,65.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3793: sastrīpuṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure // RamS_2,65.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3794: ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3795: tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau /
GE09ram_02su:3797: dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurīprakāśāṃ duḥkhena sampūrṇataro babhūva /
GE09ram_02su:3798: bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi yāny anyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3799: avākśirā dīnamanā na hṛṣṭaḥ pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma // RamS_2,65.27
GE09ram_02su:3801: apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye /
GE09ram_02su:3802: jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye // RamS_2,66.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3803: anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:3804: utpapāta tadā hṛṣṭā tyaktvā sauvarṇamānasam // RamS_2,66.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3806: bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau // RamS_2,66.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3808: aṅke bharatam āropya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // RamS_2,66.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3810: api nādhvaśramaḥ śīghraṃ rathenāpatatas tava // RamS_2,66.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3811: āryakas te sukuśalī yudhājin mātulas tava /
GE09ram_02su:3812: pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // RamS_2,66.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3813: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3814: ācaṣṭa bharataḥ sarvaṃ mātre rājīvalocanaḥ // RamS_2,66.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3816: ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me // RamS_2,66.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3817: yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3818: pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ // RamS_2,66.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3820: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhati // RamS_2,66.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3822: na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me // RamS_2,66.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3824: tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ // RamS_2,66.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3825: pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3826: āhosvid amba jyeṣṭhāyāḥ kausalyāyā niveśane // RamS_2,66.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3827: taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:3829: yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ // RamS_2,66.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:3830: tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3834: etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā /
GE09ram_02su:3835: tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā // RamS_2,66.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3836: tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:3837: utthāpayitvā śokārtaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,66.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3839: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ // RamS_2,66.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3840: sa ruditvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca /
GE09ram_02su:3841: jananīṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ // RamS_2,66.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3842: abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:3843: ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam // RamS_2,66.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3844: tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama /
GE09ram_02su:3845: pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam // RamS_2,66.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3846: amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02su:3847: dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam // RamS_2,66.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3848: na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān /
GE09ram_02su:3849: upajighreddhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram // RamS_2,66.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3851: yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati // RamS_2,66.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3852: yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3853: tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,66.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3854: pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3855: tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama // RamS_2,66.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3856: ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3857: paścimaṃ sādhusaṃdeśam icchāmi śrotum ātmanaḥ // RamS_2,66.28 //
GE09ram_02su:3858: iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:3859: rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_02su:3860: sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ // RamS_2,66.29 //*
GE09ram_02su:3861: imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava /
GE09ram_02su:3863: siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:3864: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // RamS_2,66.31 //
GE09ram_02su:3866: viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtvā bhūyaḥ papraccha mātaram // RamS_2,66.32 //
GE09ram_02su:3868: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,66.33 //
GE09ram_02su:3870: mātāsya yugapad vākyaṃ vipriyaṃ priyaśaṅkayā // RamS_2,66.34 //
GE09ram_02su:3871: sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam /
GE09ram_02su:3872: daṇḍakān saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇānucaro gataḥ // RamS_2,66.35 //
GE09ram_02su:3873: tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā /
GE09ram_02su:3874: svasya vaṃśasya māhātmyāt praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // RamS_2,66.36 //
GE09ram_02su:3875: kaccin na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit /
GE09ram_02su:3876: kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // RamS_2,66.37 //
GE09ram_02su:3878: kasmāt sa daṇḍakāraṇye bhrūṇaheva vivāsitaḥ // RamS_2,66.38 //
GE09ram_02su:3879: athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham /
GE09ram_02su:3882: kaścin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3883: na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati // RamS_2,66.40 //*
GE09ram_02su:3885: yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam // RamS_2,66.41 //
GE09ram_02su:3886: sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot /
GE09ram_02su:3887: rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā // RamS_2,66.42 //
GE09ram_02su:3888: tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3890: tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām /
GE09ram_02su:3891: tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam // RamS_2,66.44 //
GE09ram_02su:3892: tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3893: saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva // RamS_2,66.45
GE09ram_02su:3895: śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātarau ca vivāsitau /
GE09ram_02su:3896: bharato duḥkhasaṃtapta idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,67.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3897: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3898: vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca // RamS_2,67.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3899: duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3900: rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasam // RamS_2,67.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3902: aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān // RamS_2,67.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3904: duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama // RamS_2,67.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3905: nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām /
GE09ram_02su:3906: vartate guruvṛttijño yathā mātari vartate // RamS_2,67.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3907: tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:3908: tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate // RamS_2,67.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3910: prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi // RamS_2,67.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3912: pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam // RamS_2,67.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3913: lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:3914: tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam // RamS_2,67.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3916: kena śaktiprabhāvena rājyaṃ rakṣitum utsahe // RamS_2,67.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3917: taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3918: apāśrito 'bhūd dharmātmā merur meruvanaṃ yathā // RamS_2,67.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3920: damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā // RamS_2,67.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3921: atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā /
GE09ram_02su:3922: sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:3924: ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām /
GE09ram_02su:3925: śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:3927: tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:3928: roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // RamS_2,68.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3930: parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava // RamS_2,68.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3931: kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3932: yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau // RamS_2,68.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3934: kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām // RamS_2,68.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3935: yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:3936: sarvalokapriyaṃ hitvā mamāpy āpāditaṃ bhayam // RamS_2,68.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3937: tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3938: ayaśo jīvaloke ca tvayāhaṃ pratipāditaḥ // RamS_2,68.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3940: na te 'ham abhibhāṣyo 'smi durvṛtte patighātini // RamS_2,68.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3941: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3942: duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭās tvāṃ prāpya kuladūṣiṇīm // RamS_2,68.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3943: na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3944: rākṣasī tatra jātāsi kulapradhvaṃsinī pituḥ // RamS_2,68.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3945: yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3946: vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,68.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3947: yatpradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte /
GE09ram_02su:3948: bhrātṛbhyāṃ ca parityakte sarvalokasya cāpriye // RamS_2,68.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3950: kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī // RamS_2,68.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3952: jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ rāmaṃ kausalyāyā ātmasambhavam // RamS_2,68.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3954: tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ // RamS_2,68.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3957: tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale /
GE09ram_02su:3960: bindavaḥ patitā gātre sūkṣmāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ // RamS_2,68.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3962: indraḥ prāñjalir udvignaḥ surarājo 'bravīd vacaḥ // RamS_2,68.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3963: bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaścid vidyate mahat /
GE09ram_02su:3964: kutonimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi // RamS_2,68.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3965: evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:3966: pratyuvāca tato dhīrā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā // RamS_2,68.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3967: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ na vaḥ kiṃcit kutaścid amarādhipa /
GE09ram_02su:3968: ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau // RamS_2,68.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3971: mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhārapīḍitau /
GE09ram_02su:3972: yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ // RamS_2,68.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3974: kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati // RamS_2,68.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3975: ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:3976: tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase // RamS_2,68.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3977: ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām /
GE09ram_02su:3978: vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,68.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3980: svayam eva pravekṣyāmi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam // RamS_2,68.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3982: papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ // RamS_2,68.28 //
GE09ram_02su:3984: babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye //
GE09ram_02su:3987: kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt // RamS_2,69.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3989: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam // RamS_2,69.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3990: evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā /
GE09ram_02su:3991: pratasthe bharato yatra vepamānā vicetanā // RamS_2,69.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3992: sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:3993: pratasthe bharato yatra kausalyāyā niveśanam // RamS_2,69.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3997: idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:3998: samprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā // RamS_2,69.6 //*
GE09ram_02su:4000: kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī // RamS_2,69.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4001: kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati /
GE09ram_02su:4002: hiraṇyanābho yatrāste suto me sumahāyaśāḥ // RamS_2,69.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4003: atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā sukham /
GE09ram_02su:4004: agnihotraṃ puraskṛtya prasthāsye yatra rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,69.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4005: kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:4006: yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,69.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4009: evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4010: kausalyāṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtām // RamS_2,69.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4011: ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam /
GE09ram_02su:4012: vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave // RamS_2,69.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4013: kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:4014: satyasaṃdhaḥ satāṃ śreṣṭho yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4015: praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu /
GE09ram_02su:4016: hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4017: kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam /
GE09ram_02su:4018: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4020: tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4022: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syāstu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4023: saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ sattre vai yajñadakṣiṇām /
GE09ram_02su:4024: tāṃ vipralapatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4026: mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4028: sa nāśayatu duṣṭātmā yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4029: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4030: gurūṃś cāpy avajānātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4031: putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4032: sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4034: bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // RamS_2,69.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4035: ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate /
GE09ram_02su:4036: tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4037: yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage /
GE09ram_02su:4038: mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // RamS_2,69.26 //
GE09ram_02su:4039: devatānāṃ pitḥṇāṃ ca mātāpitros tathaiva ca /
GE09ram_02su:4040: mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.27 //
GE09ram_02su:4041: satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:4042: bhraśyatu kṣipram adyaiva yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.28 //
GE09ram_02su:4044: evam āśvāsayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha // RamS_2,69.29 //
GE09ram_02su:4045: tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam /
GE09ram_02su:4046: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,69.30 //
GE09ram_02su:4047: mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate /
GE09ram_02su:4048: śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me // RamS_2,69.31 //
GE09ram_02su:4049: diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4050: vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi // RamS_2,69.32 //
GE09ram_02su:4052: mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // RamS_2,69.33 //
GE09ram_02su:4054: muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ //
GE09ram_02su:4057: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ // RamS_2,70.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4058: alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4059: prāptakālaṃ narapateḥ kuru saṃyānam uttaram // RamS_2,70.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4060: vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4062: uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam /
GE09ram_02su:4065: tato daśarathaṃ putro vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // RamS_2,70.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4066: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02su:4067: vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // RamS_2,70.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4068: kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:4070: yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure /
GE09ram_02su:4071: tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite // RamS_2,70.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4072: vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate /
GE09ram_02su:4073: hīnacandreva rajanī nagarī pratibhāti mām // RamS_2,70.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4075: abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ // RamS_2,70.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4077: tāny avyagraṃ mahābāho kriyantām avicāritam // RamS_2,70.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4080: ye tv agrato narendrasya agnyagārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4081: ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi // RamS_2,70.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4083: bāṣpakaṇṭhā vimanasas tam ūhuḥ paricārakāḥ // RamS_2,70.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4084: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:4085: prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ // RamS_2,70.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4087: devadārūṇi cāhṛtya citāṃ cakrus tathāpare // RamS_2,70.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4088: gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam /
GE09ram_02su:4089: tataḥ saṃveśayāmāsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ // RamS_2,70.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4090: tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4091: jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ // RamS_2,70.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4092: śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4093: nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā // RamS_2,70.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4094: prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:4095: striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyāpramukhās tadā // RamS_2,70.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4096: krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve /
GE09ram_02su:4097: ārtānāṃ karuṇaṃ kāle krośantīnāṃ sahasraśaḥ // RamS_2,70.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4098: tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4100: kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca /
GE09ram_02su:4101: puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham //
GE09ram_02su:4105: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam /
GE09ram_02su:4106: bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā // RamS_2,71.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4107: dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca /
GE09ram_02su:4108: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau putro rājñas tasyaurdhvadaihikam // RamS_2,71.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4112: citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ // RamS_2,71.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4113: tāta yasmin nisṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave /
GE09ram_02su:4114: tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā // RamS_2,71.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4116: tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa // RamS_2,71.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4118: pituḥ śarīranirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha // RamS_2,71.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4119: sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale /
GE09ram_02su:4120: utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantradhvaja iva cyutaḥ // RamS_2,71.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4122: antakāle nipatitaṃ yayātim ṛṣayo yathā // RamS_2,71.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4124: visaṃjño nyapatad bhūmau bhūmipālam anusmaran // RamS_2,71.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4126: smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā // RamS_2,71.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4129: sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:4130: kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān // RamS_2,71.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4131: nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca /
GE09ram_02su:4132: pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati // RamS_2,71.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4134: vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena mahātmanā // RamS_2,71.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4135: pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:4136: kiṃ me jīvitasāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam // RamS_2,71.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4137: hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām /
GE09ram_02su:4138: ayodhyāṃ na pravekṣyāmi pravekṣyāmi tapovanam // RamS_2,71.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4139: tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat /
GE09ram_02su:4140: bhṛśam ārtatarā bhūyaḥ sarva evānugāminaḥ // RamS_2,71.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4141: tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughnabharatāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:4143: tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4144: vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha // RamS_2,71.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4146: teṣu cāparihāryeṣu naivaṃ bhavitum arhati // RamS_2,71.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4152: amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ // RamS_2,71.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4155: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,72.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4156: gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4157: sa rāmaḥ sattvasampannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam // RamS_2,72.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4158: balavān vīryasampanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau /
GE09ram_02su:4159: kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham // RamS_2,72.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4160: pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau /
GE09ram_02su:4161: utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,72.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4166: tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:4168: yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02su:4169: seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati // RamS_2,72.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4170: śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4171: antaḥpuracarān sarvān ity uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // RamS_2,72.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4172: tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātḥṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4173: yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām // RamS_2,72.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4175: gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat // RamS_2,72.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4177: kruddham ājñāya śatrughnaṃ vyapalāyata sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,72.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4179: yathāyaṃ samupakrānto niḥśeṣaṃ naḥ kariṣyati // RamS_2,72.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4180: sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:4181: kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ // RamS_2,72.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4182: sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4183: vicakarṣa tadā kubjāṃ krośantīṃ pṛthivītale // RamS_2,72.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4184: tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4185: citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata // RamS_2,72.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4187: aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā // RamS_2,72.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4188: sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4189: kaikeyīm abhinirbhartsya babhāṣe paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,72.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4190: tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā /
GE09ram_02su:4192: tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:4193: avadhyāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pramadāḥ kṣamyatām iti // RamS_2,72.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4194: hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:4195: yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam // RamS_2,72.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4196: imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4197: tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam // RamS_2,72.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4199: nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām // RamS_2,72.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4200: sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha /
GE09ram_02su:4201: niḥśvasantī suduḥkhārtā kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ca // RamS_2,72.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4203: śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām //
GE09ram_02su:4206: sametya rājakartāro bharataṃ vākyam abruvan // RamS_2,73.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4207: gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4208: rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // RamS_2,73.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4209: tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4210: saṃgatyā nāparādhnoti rājyam etad anāyakam // RamS_2,73.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4212: pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja // RamS_2,73.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4214: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha // RamS_2,73.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4216: bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // RamS_2,73.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4217: jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4218: naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ // RamS_2,73.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4219: rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4220: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca // RamS_2,73.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4222: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt // RamS_2,73.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4224: puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati // RamS_2,73.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4226: āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt // RamS_2,73.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4227: na sakāmāṃ kariṣyāmi svām imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:4228: vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,73.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4229: kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:4232: pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam // RamS_2,73.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4233: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02su:4234: yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi // RamS_2,73.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4235: anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca /
GE09ram_02su:4236: praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo nipetur āryānananetrasambhavāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:4237: ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4238: panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ
GE09ram_02su:4241: svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā // RamS_2,74.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4243: tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ // RamS_2,74.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4245: samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire // RamS_2,74.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4246: sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān /
GE09ram_02su:4250: latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:4251: janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān // RamS_2,74.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4252: avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu kecid vṛkṣān aropayan /
GE09ram_02su:4253: kecit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kvacit kvacit // RamS_2,74.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4255: vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ // RamS_2,74.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4257: nimnabhāgāṃs tathā kecit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ // RamS_2,74.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4258: babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4259: bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā // RamS_2,74.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4266: bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ // RamS_2,74.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4269: yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4270: bhūyas taṃ śobhayāmāsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam // RamS_2,74.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4278: samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ // RamS_2,74.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4281: sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā nabhaḥ kṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate /
GE09ram_02su:4282: narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:4287: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān // RamS_2,75.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4288: sa tūryaghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva /
GE09ram_02su:4289: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat // RamS_2,75.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4290: tataḥ prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca /
GE09ram_02su:4291: nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt // RamS_2,75.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4293: visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ // RamS_2,75.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4295: paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale // RamS_2,75.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4296: ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam /
GE09ram_02su:4297: kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā // RamS_2,75.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4301: sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata // RamS_2,75.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4303: adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca // RamS_2,75.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4305: kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ // RamS_2,75.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4307: rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām // RamS_2,75.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4309: pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā // RamS_2,75.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4311: daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā // RamS_2,75.14
GE09ram_02su:4314: dadarśa buddhisampannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva // RamS_2,76.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4317: rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit /
GE09ram_02su:4318: idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt // RamS_2,76.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4319: tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran /
GE09ram_02su:4320: dhanadhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava // RamS_2,76.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4321: rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran /
GE09ram_02su:4322: nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ // RamS_2,76.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4323: pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:4324: tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya // RamS_2,76.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4325: udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4326: koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te // RamS_2,76.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4328: jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā // RamS_2,76.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4330: vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam // RamS_2,76.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4332: dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret // RamS_2,76.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4334: rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // RamS_2,76.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4336: labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā // RamS_2,76.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4337: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi /
GE09ram_02su:4338: ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ // RamS_2,76.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4339: yaddhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye /
GE09ram_02su:4341: rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4342: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati // RamS_2,76.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4343: tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4344: harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ // RamS_2,76.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4345: yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt /
GE09ram_02su:4346: vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā // RamS_2,76.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4349: evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4351: tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt /
GE09ram_02su:4352: yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya // RamS_2,76.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4353: evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:4354: prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat // RamS_2,76.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4355: tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:4356: śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane // RamS_2,76.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4357: tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartḥn sarvān gṛhe gṛhe /
GE09ram_02su:4358: yātrāgamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ // RamS_2,76.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4359: te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4360: saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan // RamS_2,76.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4361: sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau /
GE09ram_02su:4362: rathaṃ me tvarayasveti sumantraṃ pārśvato 'bravīt // RamS_2,76.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4364: rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // RamS_2,76.26 //
GE09ram_02su:4365: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4366: guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā //
GE09ram_02su:4367: tūrṇaṃ samutthāya sumantra gaccha balasya yogāya balapradhānān /
GE09ram_02su:4368: ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya //
GE09ram_02su:4369: sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4370: śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca //
GE09ram_02su:4371: tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4372: ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān //
GE09ram_02su:4377: adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān // RamS_2,77.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4381: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // RamS_2,77.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4383: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // RamS_2,77.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4384: kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:4387: tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // RamS_2,77.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4389: kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam // RamS_2,77.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4390: dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4391: tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ // RamS_2,77.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4392: ity evaṃ kathayantas te samprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4393: pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā // RamS_2,77.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4394: ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4395: rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā // RamS_2,77.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4396: maṇikārāś ca ye kecit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4397: sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ // RamS_2,77.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4401: snāpakācchādakā vaidyā dhūpakāḥ śauṇḍikās tathā // RamS_2,77.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4403: śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā // RamS_2,77.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4405: gorathair bharataṃ yāntam anujagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ // RamS_2,77.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4407: sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ // RamS_2,77.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4410: nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām /
GE09ram_02su:4411: bharataḥ sacivān sarvān abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // RamS_2,77.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4413: viśrāntāḥ pratariṣyāmaḥ śva idānīṃ mahānadīm // RamS_2,77.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4414: dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4417: nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak // RamS_2,77.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4418: niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarhaśobhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:4419: uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano vicintayāno bharato nivartanam //
GE09ram_02su:4421: tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:4425: sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe /
GE09ram_02su:4426: bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati // RamS_2,78.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4427: atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam /
GE09ram_02su:4429: bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama /
GE09ram_02su:4431: tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:4433: nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam /
GE09ram_02su:4434: saṃnaddhānāṃ tathā yūnāṃ tiṣṭhantv ity abhyacodayat // RamS_2,78.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4435: yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:4436: seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati // RamS_2,78.8 //
