GE09ram_02su:4439: tam āyāntaṃ tu samprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02su:4442: kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā // RamS_2,78.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4443: tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4444: asaṃśayaṃ vijānīte yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // RamS_2,78.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4445: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:4446: uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti // RamS_2,78.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4448: āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,78.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4449: niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam /
GE09ram_02su:4450: nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa // RamS_2,78.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4451: asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:4452: ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat // RamS_2,78.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4454: arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi // RamS_2,78.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4456: evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham /
GE09ram_02su:4458: ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe /
GE09ram_02su:4459: yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi // RamS_2,79.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4460: ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam /
GE09ram_02su:4461: abravīd bharataḥ śrīmān niṣādādhipatiṃ punaḥ // RamS_2,79.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4463: gahano 'yaṃ bhṛśaṃ deśo gaṅgānūpo duratyayaḥ // RamS_2,79.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4465: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ guho gahanagocaraḥ // RamS_2,79.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4469: iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me // RamS_2,79.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4470: tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4471: bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,79.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4472: mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:4473: rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama // RamS_2,79.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4475: buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te // RamS_2,79.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4477: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ // RamS_2,79.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4478: dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale /
GE09ram_02su:4479: ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi // RamS_2,79.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4480: śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:4481: yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi // RamS_2,79.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4483: babhau naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // RamS_2,79.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4484: saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4485: śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat // RamS_2,79.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4487: upasthito hy anarhasya dharmaprekṣasya tādṛśaḥ // RamS_2,79.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4491: yathā sūryāṃśusaṃtapto himavān prasruto himam // RamS_2,79.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4496: guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4497: sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ prati //
GE09ram_02su:4502: bhrātṛguptyartham atyantam ahaṃ lakṣmaṇam abruvam // RamS_2,80.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4503: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā /
GE09ram_02su:4505: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvo duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4506: dharmātmaṃs tasya guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmahe vayam // RamS_2,80.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4507: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana /
GE09ram_02su:4508: motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ // RamS_2,80.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4509: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4510: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // RamS_2,80.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4511: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:4512: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha // RamS_2,80.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4513: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:4514: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi // RamS_2,80.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4516: anunītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // RamS_2,80.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4517: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:4518: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // RamS_2,80.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4519: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi /
GE09ram_02su:4520: taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // RamS_2,80.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4521: mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4523: asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:4524: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,80.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4527: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama /
GE09ram_02su:4528: nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām // RamS_2,80.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4529: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā /
GE09ram_02su:4530: duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // RamS_2,80.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4532: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // RamS_2,80.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4533: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite /
GE09ram_02su:4540: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // RamS_2,80.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4542: nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi // RamS_2,80.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4545: prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:4546: asmin bhāgīrathītīre sukhaṃ saṃtāritau mayā // RamS_2,80.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4548: vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau //
GE09ram_02su:4550: guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:4551: dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam // RamS_2,81.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4555: papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ // RamS_2,81.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4558: tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4560: tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan /
GE09ram_02su:4561: kausalyā tv anusṛtyainaṃ durmanāḥ pariṣasvaje // RamS_2,81.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4562: vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:4564: putra vyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate /
GE09ram_02su:4565: adya rājakulasyāsya tvadadhīnaṃ hi jīvitam // RamS_2,81.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4566: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate /
GE09ram_02su:4567: vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ // RamS_2,81.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4568: kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃcid apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:4569: putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate // RamS_2,81.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4570: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4571: kausalyāṃ parisāntvyedaṃ guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,81.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4572: bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4573: asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me // RamS_2,81.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4575: yadvidhaṃ pratipede ca rāme priyahite 'tithau // RamS_2,81.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4576: annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:4579: na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran // RamS_2,81.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4580: na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā /
GE09ram_02su:4581: iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā // RamS_2,81.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4583: aupavāsyaṃ tadākārṣīd rāghavaḥ saha sītayā // RamS_2,81.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4584: tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4585: vāgyatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ // RamS_2,81.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4586: saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:4587: svayam ānīya barhīṃṣi kṣipraṃ rāghavakāraṇāt // RamS_2,81.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4588: tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:4589: prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,81.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4590: etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam /
GE09ram_02su:4591: yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau // RamS_2,81.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4592: niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4593: mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya kevalam //
GE09ram_02su:4594: tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02su:4595: atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā //
GE09ram_02su:4597: tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4598: iṅgudīmūlam āgamya rāmaśayyām avekṣya tām // RamS_2,82.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4599: abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:4600: śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam // RamS_2,82.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4602: jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati // RamS_2,82.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4604: śayitvā puruṣavyāghraḥ kathaṃ śete mahītale // RamS_2,82.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4612: gāthābhir anurūpābhiḥ stutibhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ // RamS_2,82.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4613: aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02su:4614: muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ // RamS_2,82.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4615: na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃcit kālena balavattaram /
GE09ram_02su:4616: yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ // RamS_2,82.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4618: dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca // RamS_2,82.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4619: iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam /
GE09ram_02su:4620: sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam // RamS_2,82.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4621: manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4622: tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ // RamS_2,82.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4624: tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ // RamS_2,82.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4625: manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:4626: sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī // RamS_2,82.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4628: sarvalokapriyas tyaktvā rājyaṃ priyam anuttamam // RamS_2,82.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4630: sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,82.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4631: siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam /
GE09ram_02su:4632: vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā // RamS_2,82.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4634: gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite // RamS_2,82.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4635: na ca prārthayate kaścin manasāpi vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:4640: śatravo nābhimanyante bhakṣān viṣakṛtān iva // RamS_2,82.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4641: adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā /
GE09ram_02su:4643: tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:4644: taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,82.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4646: lakṣmaṇena saha tv āryo 'yodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati // RamS_2,82.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4648: api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham // RamS_2,82.26 //
GE09ram_02su:4649: prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ bahuprakāraṃ yadi na prapatsyate /
GE09ram_02su:4650: tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum //
GE09ram_02su:4652: vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4653: bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt // RamS_2,83.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4655: śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm // RamS_2,83.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4657: ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ // RamS_2,83.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4659: āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt // RamS_2,83.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4661: kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam // RamS_2,83.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4662: guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam /
GE09ram_02su:4664: sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam /
GE09ram_02su:4665: gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ // RamS_2,83.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4667: pratipraviśya nagaraṃ taṃ jñātijanam abravīt // RamS_2,83.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4668: uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:4671: pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ // RamS_2,83.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4675: sanandighoṣāṃ kalyāṇīṃ guho nāvam upāharat // RamS_2,83.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4676: tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4677: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // RamS_2,83.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4678: purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye /
GE09ram_02su:4681: bhāṇḍāni cādadānānāṃ ghoṣas tridivam aspṛśat // RamS_2,83.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4682: patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4683: vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ // RamS_2,83.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4684: nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāścit kāścit tu vājinām /
GE09ram_02su:4685: kaścit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam // RamS_2,83.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4686: tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:4689: tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ // RamS_2,83.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4690: nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare /
GE09ram_02su:4691: anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ // RamS_2,83.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4692: sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam /
GE09ram_02su:4693: maitre muhūrte prayayau prayāgavanam uttamam // RamS_2,83.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4694: āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam /
GE09ram_02su:4695: draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam ṛtvigvṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe //
GE09ram_02su:4698: balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ // RamS_2,84.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4700: vasāno vāsasī kṣaume purodhāya purohitam // RamS_2,84.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4702: mantriṇas tān avasthāpya jagāmānu purohitam // RamS_2,84.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4704: saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan // RamS_2,84.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4706: abudhyata mahātejāḥ sutaṃ daśarathasya tam // RamS_2,84.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4707: tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:4708: ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule // RamS_2,84.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4709: ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu /
GE09ram_02su:4710: jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat // RamS_2,84.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4715: kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4716: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ // RamS_2,84.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4718: bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam // RamS_2,84.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4720: vanavāsī bhavetīha samāḥ kila caturdaśa // RamS_2,84.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4721: kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi /
GE09ram_02su:4722: akaṇṭakaṃ bhoktumanā rājyaṃ tasyānujasya ca // RamS_2,84.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4723: evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:4725: hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate /
GE09ram_02su:4726: matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi // RamS_2,84.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4727: na caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare /
GE09ram_02su:4728: nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade // RamS_2,84.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4729: ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4730: pratinetum ayodhyāṃ ca pādau tasyābhivanditum // RamS_2,84.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4731: tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:4732: śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva samprati mahīpatiḥ // RamS_2,84.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4733: uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4735: guruvṛttir damaś caiva sādhūnāṃ cānuyāyitā // RamS_2,84.19 //*
GE09ram_02su:4736: jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti /
GE09ram_02su:4737: apṛcchaṃ tvāṃ tavātyarthaṃ kīrtiṃ samabhivardhayan // RamS_2,84.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4738: asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau /
GE09ram_02su:4739: śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4740: etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida // RamS_2,84.21 //*
GE09ram_02su:4741: tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4742: cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:4744: kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4746: abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:4747: pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad upapadyate // RamS_2,85.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4749: jāne tvāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kenacit // RamS_2,85.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4750: senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam /
GE09ram_02su:4751: mama prītir yathārūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha // RamS_2,85.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4752: kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4756: vājimukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca varavāraṇāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4757: pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām // RamS_2,85.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4758: te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā /
GE09ram_02su:4759: na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ // RamS_2,85.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4761: tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam // RamS_2,85.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4764: āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:4765: ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām // RamS_2,85.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4766: prāksrotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyaksrotasa eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:4767: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,85.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4768: anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām /
GE09ram_02su:4771: tathaivāpsaraso devīr gandharvīś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,85.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4773: śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4774: sarvās tumburuṇā sārdham āhvaye saparicchadāḥ // RamS_2,85.15 //*
GE09ram_02su:4775: vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapattravat /
GE09ram_02su:4776: divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu // RamS_2,85.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4777: iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam /
GE09ram_02su:4778: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu // RamS_2,85.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4780: surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca // RamS_2,85.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4784: ājagmus tāni sarvāṇi daivatāni pṛthakpṛthak // RamS_2,85.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4786: upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ // RamS_2,85.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4788: devadundubhighoṣaś ca dikṣu sarvāsu śuśruve // RamS_2,85.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4790: prajagur devagandharvā vīṇāḥ pramumucuḥ svarān // RamS_2,85.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4791: sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:4793: tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām /
GE09ram_02su:4794: dadarśa bhārataṃ sainyaṃ vidhānaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,85.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4795: babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam /
GE09ram_02su:4797: tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4798: āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ // RamS_2,85.27 //
GE09ram_02su:4800: ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā // RamS_2,85.28 //
GE09ram_02su:4810: veśma tad ratnasampūrṇaṃ bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ // RamS_2,85.33 //
GE09ram_02su:4811: anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4812: babhūvuś ca mudā yuktās taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśmasaṃvidhim // RamS_2,85.34 //
GE09ram_02su:4813: tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chattram eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:4814: bharato mantribhiḥ sārdham abhyavartata rājavat // RamS_2,85.35 //
GE09ram_02su:4818: tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ // RamS_2,85.37 //
GE09ram_02su:4822: ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ // RamS_2,85.39 //
GE09ram_02su:4824: āgur viṃśatisāhasrā brahmaṇā prahitāḥ striyaḥ // RamS_2,85.40 //
GE09ram_02su:4827: yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate /
GE09ram_02su:4832: upānṛtyaṃs tu bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanāt // RamS_2,85.44 //
GE09ram_02su:4833: yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane /
GE09ram_02su:4834: prayāge tāny adṛśyanta bharadvājasya śāsanāt // RamS_2,85.45 //
GE09ram_02su:4836: aśvatthā nartakāś cāsan bharadvājasya tejasā // RamS_2,85.46 //
GE09ram_02su:4838: prahṛṣṭās tatra saṃpetuḥ kubjā bhūtvātha vāmanāḥ // RamS_2,85.47 //
GE09ram_02su:4839: śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4841: surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4842: māṃsāni ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha // RamS_2,85.49 //
GE09ram_02su:4844: apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ sapta cāṣṭa ca // RamS_2,85.50 //
GE09ram_02su:4846: parimṛjya tathā nyāyaṃ pāyayanti varāṅganāḥ // RamS_2,85.51 //
GE09ram_02su:4847: hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān /
GE09ram_02su:4848: ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān /
GE09ram_02su:4851: mattapramattamuditā camūḥ sā tatra saṃbabhau // RamS_2,85.53 //
GE09ram_02su:4855: kuśalaṃ bharatasyāstu rāmasyāstu tathā sukham // RamS_2,85.55 //
GE09ram_02su:4857: anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan // RamS_2,85.56 //
GE09ram_02su:4858: samprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4860: tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam /
GE09ram_02su:4861: divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ // RamS_2,85.58 //
GE09ram_02su:4862: preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4863: babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ // RamS_2,85.59 //
GE09ram_02su:4864: kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4865: babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat // RamS_2,85.60 //
GE09ram_02su:4867: rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaścid adṛśyata // RamS_2,85.61 //
GE09ram_02su:4871: dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ // RamS_2,85.63 //
GE09ram_02su:4873: tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ // RamS_2,85.64 //
GE09ram_02su:4877: sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4879: hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare /
GE09ram_02su:4880: babhūvuḥ pāyasasyānte śarkarāyāś ca saṃcayāḥ // RamS_2,85.67 //
GE09ram_02su:4881: kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:4882: dadṛśur bhājanasthāni tīrtheṣu saritāṃ narāḥ // RamS_2,85.68 //
GE09ram_02su:4884: śuklāṃś candanakalkāṃś ca samudgeṣv avatiṣṭhataḥ // RamS_2,85.69 //
GE09ram_02su:4885: darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān /
GE09ram_02su:4886: pādukopānahāṃ caiva yugmān yatra sahasraśaḥ // RamS_2,85.70 //
GE09ram_02su:4887: āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca /
GE09ram_02su:4888: marmatrāṇāni citrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca // RamS_2,85.71 //
GE09ram_02su:4890: avagāhya sutīrthāṃś ca hradān sotpalapuṣkarān // RamS_2,85.72 //
GE09ram_02su:4892: nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,85.73 //
GE09ram_02su:4893: vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam /
GE09ram_02su:4894: dṛṣṭvātithyaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛg bharatasya maharṣiṇā // RamS_2,85.74 //
GE09ram_02su:4895: ity evaṃ ramamāṇānāṃ devānām iva nandane /
GE09ram_02su:4896: bharadvājāśrame ramye sā rātrir vyatyavartata // RamS_2,85.75 //
GE09ram_02su:4897: pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam /
GE09ram_02su:4898: bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ // RamS_2,85.76 //
GE09ram_02su:4899: tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4900: tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:4902: tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4903: kṛtātithyo bharadvājaṃ kāmād abhijagāma ha // RamS_2,86.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4904: tam ṛṣiḥ puruṣavyāghraṃ prekṣya prāñjalim āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:4906: kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā /
GE09ram_02su:4907: samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha // RamS_2,86.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4911: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā // RamS_2,86.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4913: api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ // RamS_2,86.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4915: samīpaṃ prasthitaṃ bhrātur maitreṇekṣasva cakṣuṣā // RamS_2,86.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4917: ācakṣva katamo mārgaḥ kiyān iti ca śaṃsa me // RamS_2,86.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4922: uttaraṃ pārśvam āsādya tasya mandākinī nadī /
GE09ram_02su:4924: anantaraṃ tat saritaś citrakūṭaś ca parvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4925: tayoḥ parṇakuṭī tāta tatra tau vasato dhruvam // RamS_2,86.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4928: vāhayasva mahābhāga tato drakṣyasi rāghavam // RamS_2,86.13 //*
GE09ram_02su:4929: prayāṇam iti ca śrutvā rājarājasya yoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4930: hitvā yānāni yānārhā brāhmaṇaṃ paryavārayan // RamS_2,86.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4931: vepamānā kṛśā dīnā saha devyā sumitrayā /
GE09ram_02su:4932: kausalyā tatra jagrāha karābhyāṃ caraṇau muneḥ // RamS_2,86.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4934: kaikeyī tasya jagrāha caraṇau savyapatrapā // RamS_2,86.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4936: adūrād bharatasyaiva tasthau dīnamanās tadā // RamS_2,86.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4938: viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātḥṇāṃ tava rāghava // RamS_2,86.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4939: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4940: uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyaṃ vacanakovidaḥ // RamS_2,86.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4942: pitur hi mahiṣīṃ devīṃ devatām iva paśyasi // RamS_2,86.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4944: kausalyā suṣuve rāmaṃ dhātāram aditir yathā // RamS_2,86.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4945: asyā vāmabhujaṃ śliṣṭā yaiṣā tiṣṭhati durmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4947: etasyās tau sutau devyāḥ kumārau devavarṇinau /
GE09ram_02su:4949: yasyāḥ kṛte naravyāghrau jīvanāśam ito gatau /
GE09ram_02su:4950: rājā putravihīnaś ca svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // RamS_2,86.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4953: yatomūlaṃ hi paśyāmi vyasanaṃ mahad ātmanaḥ // RamS_2,86.25 //*
GE09ram_02su:4955: sa niśaśvāsa tāmrākṣo nāgaḥ kruddha ivāsakṛt // RamS_2,86.26 //
GE09ram_02su:4956: bharadvājo maharṣis taṃ bruvantaṃ bharataṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4957: pratyuvāca mahābuddhir idaṃ vacanam arthavat // RamS_2,86.27 //
GE09ram_02su:4959: rāmapravrājanaṃ hy etat sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,86.28 //
GE09ram_02su:4960: abhivādya tu saṃsiddhaḥ kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02su:4961: āmantrya bharataḥ sainyaṃ yujyatām ity acodayat // RamS_2,86.29 //
GE09ram_02su:4963: adhyārohat prayāṇārthī bahūn bahuvidho janaḥ // RamS_2,86.30 //
GE09ram_02su:4965: jīmūtā iva gharmānte saghoṣāḥ sampratasthire // RamS_2,86.31 //
GE09ram_02su:4966: vividhāny api yānāni mahānti ca laghūni ca /
GE09ram_02su:4967: prayayuḥ sumahārhāṇi pādair eva padātayaḥ // RamS_2,86.32 //
GE09ram_02su:4971: āsthāya prayayau śrīmān bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ // RamS_2,86.34 //
GE09ram_02su:4974: vanāni tu vyatikramya juṣṭāni mṛgapakṣibhiḥ // RamS_2,86.35 //*
GE09ram_02su:4976: mahad vanaṃ tat pravigāhamānā rarāja senā bharatasya tatra // RamS_2,86.36
GE09ram_02su:4979: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthāḥ sampradudruvuḥ // RamS_2,87.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4980: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4981: dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca // RamS_2,87.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4983: vṛto mahatyā nādinyā senayā caturaṅgayā // RamS_2,87.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4985: mahīṃ saṃchādayāmāsa prāvṛṣi dyām ivāmbudaḥ // RamS_2,87.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4987: anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ // RamS_2,87.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4989: uvāca bharataḥ śrīmān vasiṣṭhaṃ mantriṇāṃ varam // RamS_2,87.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4990: yādṛśaṃ lakṣyate rūpaṃ yathā caiva śrutaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:4991: vyaktaṃ prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt // RamS_2,87.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4992: ayaṃ giriś citrakūṭas tathā mandākinī nadī /
GE09ram_02su:4993: etat prakāśate dūrān nīlameghanibhaṃ vanam // RamS_2,87.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4997: nīlā ivātapāpāye toyaṃ toyadharā ghanāḥ // RamS_2,87.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4999: hayaiḥ samantād ākīrṇaṃ makarair iva sāgaram // RamS_2,87.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5003: meghaprakāśaiḥ phalakair dākṣiṇātyā yathā narāḥ // RamS_2,87.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5005: ayodhyeva janākīrṇā samprati pratibhāti mā // RamS_2,87.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5006: khurair udīrito reṇur divaṃ pracchādya tiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02su:5007: taṃ vahaty anilaḥ śīghraṃ kurvann iva mama priyam // RamS_2,87.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5009: etān saṃpatataḥ śīghraṃ paśya śatrughna kānane // RamS_2,87.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5011: etam āviśataḥ śailam adhivāsaṃ patatriṇām // RamS_2,87.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5012: atimātram ayaṃ deśo manojñaḥ pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02su:5013: tāpasānāṃ nivāso 'yaṃ vyaktaṃ svargapatho yathā // RamS_2,87.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5014: mṛgā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bahavaḥ pṛṣatā vane /
GE09ram_02su:5015: manojñarūpā lakṣyante kusumair iva citritāḥ // RamS_2,87.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5016: sādhu sainyāḥ pratiṣṭhantāṃ vicinvantu ca kānanam /
GE09ram_02su:5017: yathā tau puruṣavyāghrau dṛśyete rāmalakṣmaṇau // RamS_2,87.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5019: viviśus tad vanaṃ śūrā dhūmaṃ ca dadṛśus tataḥ // RamS_2,87.21 //
GE09ram_02su:5020: te samālokya dhūmāgram ūcur bharatam āgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5021: nāmanuṣye bhavaty agnir vyaktam atraiva rāghavau // RamS_2,87.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5023: anye rāmopamāḥ santi vyaktam atra tapasvinaḥ // RamS_2,87.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5024: tac chrutvā bharatas teṣāṃ vacanaṃ sādhusaṃmatam /
GE09ram_02su:5025: sainyān uvāca sarvāṃs tān amitrabalamardanaḥ // RamS_2,87.24 //
GE09ram_02su:5026: yattā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu neto gantavyam agrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5027: aham eva gamiṣyāmi sumantro gurur eva ca // RamS_2,87.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5028: evam uktās tataḥ sarve tatra tasthuḥ samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5029: bharato yatra dhūmāgraṃ tatra dṛṣṭiṃ samādadhāt // RamS_2,87.26 //
GE09ram_02su:5030: vyavasthitā yā bharatena sā camūr nirīkṣamāṇāpi ca dhūmam agrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5031: babhūva hṛṣṭā nacireṇa jānatī priyasya rāmasya samāgamaṃ tadā //
GE09ram_02su:5034: vaidehyāḥ priyamākāṅkṣan svaṃ ca cittaṃ vilobhayan // RamS_2,88.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5036: bhāryām amarasaṃkāśaḥ śacīm iva puraṃdaraḥ // RamS_2,88.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5037: na rājyād bhraṃśanaṃ bhadre na suhṛdbhir vinābhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5038: mano me bādhate dṛṣṭvā ramaṇīyam imaṃ girim // RamS_2,88.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5040: śikharaiḥ kham ivodviddhair dhātumadbhir vibhūṣitam // RamS_2,88.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5046: aduṣṭair bhāty ayaṃ śailo bahupakṣisamākulaḥ // RamS_2,88.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5052: evamādibhir ākīrṇaḥ śriyaṃ puṣyaty ayaṃ giriḥ // RamS_2,88.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5054: kiṃnarān dvaṃdvaśo bhadre ramamāṇān manasvinaḥ // RamS_2,88.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5055: śākhāvasaktān khaḍgāṃś ca pravarāṇy ambarāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:5057: jalaprapātair udbhedair nisyandaiś ca kvacit kvacit /
GE09ram_02su:5058: sravadbhir bhāty ayaṃ śailaḥ sravan mada iva dvipaḥ // RamS_2,88.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5060: ghrāṇatarpaṇam abhyetya kaṃ naraṃ na praharṣayet // RamS_2,88.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5062: lakṣmaṇena ca vatsyāmi na māṃ śokaḥ pradhakṣyati // RamS_2,88.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5064: vicitraśikhare hy asmin ratavān asmi bhāmini // RamS_2,88.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5066: pituś cānṛṇatā dharme bharatasya priyaṃ tathā // RamS_2,88.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5067: vaidehi ramase kaccic citrakūṭe mayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:5069: idam evāmṛtaṃ prāhū rājñāṃ rājarṣayaḥ pare /
GE09ram_02su:5070: vanavāsaṃ bhavārthāya pretya me prapitāmahāḥ // RamS_2,88.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5074: oṣadhyaḥ svaprabhā lakṣmyā bhrājamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ // RamS_2,88.21 //
GE09ram_02su:5076: kecid ekaśilā bhānti parvatasyāsya bhāmini // RamS_2,88.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5078: citrakūṭasya kūṭo 'sau dṛśyate sarvataḥ śivaḥ // RamS_2,88.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5082: kāmibhir vanite paśya phalāni vividhāni ca // RamS_2,88.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5085: imaṃ tu kālaṃ vanite vijahrivāṃs tvayā ca sīte saha lakṣmaṇena ca /
GE09ram_02su:5086: ratiṃ prapatsye kuladharmavardhinīṃ satāṃ pathi svair niyamaiḥ paraiḥ sthitaḥ // RamS_2,88.27
GE09ram_02su:5089: adarśayac chubhajalāṃ ramyāṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm // RamS_2,89.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5093: kusumair upasaṃpannāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // RamS_2,89.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5095: rājantīṃ rājarājasya nalinīm iva sarvataḥ // RamS_2,89.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5097: tīrthāni ramaṇīyāni ratiṃ saṃjanayanti me // RamS_2,89.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5099: ṛṣayas tv avagāhante nadīṃ mandākinīṃ priye // RamS_2,89.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5103: pādapaiḥ pattrapuṣpāṇi sṛjadbhir abhito nadīm // RamS_2,89.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5105: kaccit siddhajanākīrṇāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // RamS_2,89.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5107: poplūyamānān aparān paśya tvaṃ jalamadhyagān // RamS_2,89.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5109: adhirohanti kalyāṇi niṣkūjantaḥ śubhā giraḥ // RamS_2,89.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5111: adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt // RamS_2,89.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5114: sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandākinīm imām /
GE09ram_02su:5115: kamalāny avamajjantī puṣkarāṇi ca bhāmini // RamS_2,89.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5116: tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam /
GE09ram_02su:5117: manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm // RamS_2,89.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5119: tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama // RamS_2,89.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5121: nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha // RamS_2,89.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5122: imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5123: supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ na so 'sti yaḥ syān na gatakramaḥ sukhī // RamS_2,89.18
GE09ram_02su:5124: itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ priyāsahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan /
GE09ram_02su:5125: cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:5128: sainyareṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥspṛśau // RamS_2,90.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5129: etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5130: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ // RamS_2,90.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5131: sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5132: tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata // RamS_2,90.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5133: tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam /
GE09ram_02su:5134: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // RamS_2,90.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5135: hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:5137: rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane /
GE09ram_02su:5138: anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃcit saumitre jñātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:5139: sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi // RamS_2,90.6 //*
GE09ram_02su:5140: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam /
GE09ram_02su:5141: prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata // RamS_2,90.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5145: śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,90.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5146: agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām /
GE09ram_02su:5147: sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā // RamS_2,90.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5148: taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:5149: aṅgāvekṣasva saumitre kasyaitāṃ manyase camūm // RamS_2,90.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5150: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:5151: didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā // RamS_2,90.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5152: sampannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam /
GE09ram_02su:5153: āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,90.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5154: eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate /
GE09ram_02su:5156: bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān /
GE09ram_02su:5157: ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā gajān āruhya sādinaḥ // RamS_2,90.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5159: api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe // RamS_2,90.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5160: api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02su:5161: tvayā rāghava samprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā // RamS_2,90.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5162: yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatāt /
GE09ram_02su:5163: samprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me // RamS_2,90.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5164: bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:5165: pūrvāpakāriṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate /
GE09ram_02su:5166: etasmin nihate kṛtsnām anuśādhi vasuṃdharām // RamS_2,90.19 //*
GE09ram_02su:5167: adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā /
GE09ram_02su:5168: mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam // RamS_2,90.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5171: adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada /
GE09ram_02su:5172: mokṣyāmi śatrusainyeṣu kakṣeṣv iva hutāśanam // RamS_2,90.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5176: śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāṃś ca nihatān mayā // RamS_2,90.24 //
GE09ram_02su:5178: sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,90.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5181: rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,91.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5182: kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:5183: maheṣvāse mahāprājñe bharate svayam āgate // RamS_2,91.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5184: prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:5185: asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃcid ācaret // RamS_2,91.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5186: vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim /
GE09ram_02su:5187: īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase // RamS_2,91.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5188: na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5189: ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte // RamS_2,91.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5190: kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcid āpadi /
GE09ram_02su:5191: bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ // RamS_2,91.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5192: yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase /
GE09ram_02su:5193: vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām // RamS_2,91.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5194: ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5195: rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati // RamS_2,91.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5196: tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5197: lakṣmaṇaḥ praviveśeva svāni gātrāṇi lajjayā // RamS_2,91.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5198: vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:5199: eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ // RamS_2,91.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5201: imāṃ vāpy eṣa vaidehīm atyantasukhasevinīm // RamS_2,91.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5205: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ // RamS_2,91.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5206: avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5207: lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ // RamS_2,91.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5208: bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā sammardo na bhaved iti /
GE09ram_02su:5209: samantāt tasya śailasya senāvāsam akalpayat // RamS_2,91.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5212: sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam /
GE09ram_02su:5213: prasādanārthaṃ raghunandanasya virocate nītimatā praṇītā // RamS_2,91.17
GE09ram_02su:5215: niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5216: abhigantuṃ sa kākutstham iyeṣa guruvartakam // RamS_2,92.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5218: bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt // RamS_2,92.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5219: kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5220: lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi // RamS_2,92.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5221: yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam /
GE09ram_02su:5222: vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,92.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5223: yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam /
GE09ram_02su:5224: bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,92.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5226: śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,92.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5227: yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5228: abhiṣekajalaklinno na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,92.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5232: yasmin vasati kākutsthaḥ kubera iva nandane // RamS_2,92.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5234: yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // RamS_2,92.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5236: padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam // RamS_2,92.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5238: puṣpitāgrāṇi madhyena jagāma vadatāṃ varaḥ // RamS_2,92.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5239: sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam /
GE09ram_02su:5241: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5242: atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ // RamS_2,92.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5243: sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam /
GE09ram_02su:5244: guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā //
GE09ram_02su:5246: niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:5247: jagāma bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śatrughnam anudarśayan // RamS_2,93.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5248: ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātḥn me śīghram ānaya /
GE09ram_02su:5249: iti tvaritam agre sa jagāma guruvatsalaḥ // RamS_2,93.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5250: sumantras tv api śatrughnam adūrād anvapadyata /
GE09ram_02su:5251: rāmadarśanajas tarṣo bharatasyeva tasya ca // RamS_2,93.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5253: bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha // RamS_2,93.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5254: śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:5255: kāṣṭhāni cāvabhagnāni puṣpāṇy avacitāni ca // RamS_2,93.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5256: dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān /
GE09ram_02su:5257: mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca karīṣaiḥ śītakāraṇāt // RamS_2,93.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5258: gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:5259: śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,93.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5260: manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:5261: nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ // RamS_2,93.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5262: uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam /
GE09ram_02su:5263: abhijñānakṛtaḥ panthā vikāle gantum icchatā // RamS_2,93.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5266: yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:5267: tasyāsau dṛśyate dhūmaḥ saṃkulaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanaḥ // RamS_2,93.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5269: āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam // RamS_2,93.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5270: atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5271: mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,93.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5273: janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam // RamS_2,93.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5275: sarvān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,93.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5277: rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // RamS_2,93.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5278: evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5279: dadarśa mahatīṃ puṇyāṃ parṇaśālāṃ manoramām // RamS_2,93.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5281: viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare // RamS_2,93.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5285: śobhitāṃ dīptavadanaiḥ sarpair bhogavatīm iva // RamS_2,93.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5289: arisaṃghair anādhṛṣyāṃ mṛgaiḥ siṃhaguhām iva // RamS_2,93.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5291: dadarśa bharatas tatra puṇyāṃ rāmaniveśane // RamS_2,93.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5292: nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum /
GE09ram_02su:5295: dadarśa rāmam āsīnam abhitaḥ pāvakopamam // RamS_2,93.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5299: sthaṇḍile darbhasaṃstīrṇe sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca // RamS_2,93.27 //
GE09ram_02su:5303: aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ dhairyād vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,93.29 //
GE09ram_02su:5304: yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum /
GE09ram_02su:5305: vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ // RamS_2,93.30 //
GE09ram_02su:5307: mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran // RamS_2,93.31 //
GE09ram_02su:5308: adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:5309: so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham // RamS_2,93.32 //
GE09ram_02su:5310: yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5313: malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate // RamS_2,93.34 //
GE09ram_02su:5314: mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5315: dhig jīvitaṃ nṛśaṃsasya mama lokavigarhitam // RamS_2,93.35 //
GE09ram_02su:5317: pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan // RamS_2,93.36 //
GE09ram_02su:5319: uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃcana // RamS_2,93.37 //
GE09ram_02su:5321: āryety evābhisaṃkruśya vyāhartuṃ nāśakat tataḥ // RamS_2,93.38 //
GE09ram_02su:5322: śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan /
GE09ram_02su:5323: tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat // RamS_2,93.39 //
GE09ram_02su:5324: tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye /
GE09ram_02su:5325: divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām //
GE09ram_02su:5326: tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye /
GE09ram_02su:5327: vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya harṣam //
GE09ram_02su:5329: āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5330: aṅke bharatam āropya paryapṛcchat samāhitaḥ // RamS_2,94.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5331: kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5332: na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi // RamS_2,94.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5333: cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:5334: duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ // RamS_2,94.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5337: sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5338: ikṣvākūṇām upādhyāyo yathāvat tāta pūjyate // RamS_2,94.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5339: tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī /
GE09ram_02su:5340: sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī // RamS_2,94.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5342: anasūyur anudraṣṭā satkṛtas te purohitaḥ // RamS_2,94.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5343: kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5344: hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā // RamS_2,94.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5346: sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase // RamS_2,94.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5348: kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ // RamS_2,94.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5349: mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:5351: kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase /
GE09ram_02su:5353: kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02su:5354: kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati // RamS_2,94.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5356: kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava // RamS_2,94.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5357: kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5358: vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ // RamS_2,94.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5359: kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5360: tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam // RamS_2,94.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5361: kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam /
GE09ram_02su:5362: paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat // RamS_2,94.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5363: sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5364: atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā // RamS_2,94.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5365: eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5366: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam // RamS_2,94.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5367: kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5368: jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ // RamS_2,94.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5370: śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu // RamS_2,94.21 //
GE09ram_02su:5371: kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02su:5374: śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate // RamS_2,94.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5375: kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5376: kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // RamS_2,94.24 //
GE09ram_02su:5377: balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5378: dṛṣṭāpadānā vikrāntās tvayā satkṛtya mānitāḥ // RamS_2,94.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5379: kaccid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam /
GE09ram_02su:5380: samprāptakālaṃ dātavyaṃ dadāsi na vilambase // RamS_2,94.26 //
GE09ram_02su:5382: bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ // RamS_2,94.27 //
GE09ram_02su:5384: kaccit prāṇāṃs tavārtheṣu saṃtyajanti samāhitāḥ // RamS_2,94.28 //
GE09ram_02su:5386: yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ // RamS_2,94.29 //
GE09ram_02su:5387: kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:5388: tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ // RamS_2,94.30 //
GE09ram_02su:5389: kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā /
GE09ram_02su:5391: kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase /
GE09ram_02su:5392: anarthakuśalā hy ete bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // RamS_2,94.32 //
GE09ram_02su:5394: buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te // RamS_2,94.33 //
GE09ram_02su:5395: vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5398: jitendriyair mahotsāhair vṛtām āryaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // RamS_2,94.35 //
GE09ram_02su:5400: kaccit samuditāṃ sphītām ayodhyāṃ parirakṣasi // RamS_2,94.36 //
GE09ram_02su:5402: devasthānaiḥ prapābhiś ca taḍāgaiś copaśobhitaḥ // RamS_2,94.37 //
GE09ram_02su:5406: kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava // RamS_2,94.39 //
GE09ram_02su:5408: vārttāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate // RamS_2,94.40 //
GE09ram_02su:5409: teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:5410: rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ // RamS_2,94.41 //
GE09ram_02su:5411: kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5412: kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase // RamS_2,94.42 //
GE09ram_02su:5413: kaccin nāgavanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca tṛpyasi /
GE09ram_02su:5417: yantraiś ca paripūrṇāni tathā śilpidhanurdharaiḥ // RamS_2,94.44 //
GE09ram_02su:5418: āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5419: apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava // RamS_2,94.45 //
GE09ram_02su:5421: yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ // RamS_2,94.46 //
GE09ram_02su:5423: apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ // RamS_2,94.47 //
GE09ram_02su:5424: gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5425: kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha // RamS_2,94.48 //
GE09ram_02su:5426: vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya durgatasya ca rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:5427: arthaṃ virāgāḥ paśyanti tavāmātyā bahuśrutāḥ // RamS_2,94.49 //
GE09ram_02su:5429: tāni putrapaśūn ghnanti prītyartham anuśāsataḥ // RamS_2,94.50 //
GE09ram_02su:5430: kaccid vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:5431: dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase // RamS_2,94.51 //
GE09ram_02su:5432: kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn /
GE09ram_02su:5433: caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi // RamS_2,94.52 //
GE09ram_02su:5434: kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5435: ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase // RamS_2,94.53 //
GE09ram_02su:5436: kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_02su:5437: vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase // RamS_2,94.54 //
GE09ram_02su:5445: kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa // RamS_2,94.58 //
GE09ram_02su:5446: kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:5449: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:5450: kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati // RamS_2,95.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5452: jyeṣṭhaputre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ // RamS_2,95.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5453: sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:5454: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ kulasyāsya bhavāya naḥ // RamS_2,95.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5455: rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama /
GE09ram_02su:5456: yasya dharmārthasahitaṃ vṛttam āhur amānuṣam // RamS_2,95.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5457: kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:5458: divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // RamS_2,95.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5460: ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau // RamS_2,95.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5461: priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:5462: akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ // RamS_2,95.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5463: tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām /
GE09ram_02su:5466: pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5467: vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha // RamS_2,95.9 //*
GE09ram_02su:5468: tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim /
GE09ram_02su:5471: rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai // RamS_2,95.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5472: sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan /
GE09ram_02su:5474: kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5475: yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ // RamS_2,95.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5476: aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha /
GE09ram_02su:5477: śatrugheṇa ca sarveṣu pretakṛtyeṣu satkṛtaḥ // RamS_2,95.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5481: ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate // RamS_2,95.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5482: purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan /
GE09ram_02su:5483: vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham // RamS_2,95.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5484: evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5486: sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02su:5487: bharato duḥkham ācaṣṭe svargataṃ pṛthivīpatim // RamS_2,95.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5488: sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām /
GE09ram_02su:5489: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,95.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5492: sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja /
GE09ram_02su:5493: ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā // RamS_2,95.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5495: mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍhabhaktimān // RamS_2,95.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5496: sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:5497: avātārayad ālambya nadīṃ mandākinīṃ śivām // RamS_2,95.24 //
GE09ram_02su:5498: te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5499: nadīṃ mandākinīṃ ramyāṃ sadā puṣpitakānanām // RamS_2,95.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5501: siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti // RamS_2,95.26 //
GE09ram_02su:5503: diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,95.27 //
GE09ram_02su:5504: etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam /
GE09ram_02su:5507: pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // RamS_2,95.29 //
GE09ram_02su:5509: nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,95.30 //
GE09ram_02su:5510: idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārāja prīto yadaśanā vayam /
GE09ram_02su:5511: yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ // RamS_2,95.31 //
GE09ram_02su:5516: teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau /
GE09ram_02su:5517: bhrātḥṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva // RamS_2,95.34 //
GE09ram_02su:5519: abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam /
GE09ram_02su:5520: teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam // RamS_2,95.35 //*
GE09ram_02su:5521: atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam /
GE09ram_02su:5522: apy ekamanaso jagmur yathāsthānaṃ pradhāvitāḥ // RamS_2,95.36 //
GE09ram_02su:5523: hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5524: sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ // RamS_2,95.37 //
GE09ram_02su:5526: draṣṭukāmo janaḥ sarvo jagāma sahasāśramam // RamS_2,95.38 //
GE09ram_02su:5527: bhrātḥṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam /
GE09ram_02su:5530: mumoca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ dyaur ivābhrasamāgame // RamS_2,95.40 //
GE09ram_02su:5532: āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ // RamS_2,95.41 //
GE09ram_02su:5536: tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ // RamS_2,95.43 //
GE09ram_02su:5537: tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:5538: manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā // RamS_2,95.44 //
GE09ram_02su:5540: paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ // RamS_2,95.45 //
GE09ram_02su:5541: sa tatra kāṃścit pariṣasvaje narān narāś ca kecit tu tam abhyavādayan /
GE09ram_02su:5542: cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān yathārham āsādya tadā nṛpātmajaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:5543: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5544: guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve //
GE09ram_02su:5546: vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:5548: rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:5549: dadṛśus tatra tat tīrthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇasevitam // RamS_2,96.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5551: sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // RamS_2,96.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5553: vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayīkṛtāḥ // RamS_2,96.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5554: itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5555: svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt // RamS_2,96.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5558: taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā /
GE09ram_02su:5559: uvāca devī kausalyā sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ // RamS_2,96.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5561: rāghaveṇa pitur dattaṃ paśyataitad yathāvidhi // RamS_2,96.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5563: naitad aupayikaṃ manye bhuktabhogasya bhojanam // RamS_2,96.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5565: katham iṅgudīpiṇyākaṃ sa bhuṅkte vasudhādhipaḥ // RamS_2,96.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5566: ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃcit pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02su:5567: yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān // RamS_2,96.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5569: kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā // RamS_2,96.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5570: evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:5571: dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram // RamS_2,96.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5573: ārtā mumucur aśrūṇi sasvaraṃ śokakarśitāḥ // RamS_2,96.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5574: tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān /
GE09ram_02su:5578: saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātḥn samprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5580: yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5581: vṛttiṃ daśarathāj jāte lakṣmaṇe śubhalakṣaṇe // RamS_2,96.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5583: śvaśrūṇām aśrupūrṇākṣī sā babhūvāgrataḥ sthitā // RamS_2,96.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5584: tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02su:5585: vanavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,96.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5587: rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ samprāptā nirjane vane // RamS_2,96.21 //
GE09ram_02su:5589: kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ // RamS_2,96.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5590: mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam /
GE09ram_02su:5593: pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,96.24 //
GE09ram_02su:5594: purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5595: pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:5596: tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ
GE09ram_02su:5597: janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam //
GE09ram_02su:5598: upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:5599: śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim //
GE09ram_02su:5600: kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:5601: itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā //
GE09ram_02su:5602: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5603: vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ
GE09ram_02su:5605: taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam /
GE09ram_02su:5606: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // RamS_2,97.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5607: kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:5608: yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī // RamS_2,97.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5610: hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi // RamS_2,97.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5612: pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,97.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5613: āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram /
GE09ram_02su:5615: striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02su:5616: cakāra sumahat pāpam idam ātmayaśoharam // RamS_2,97.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5618: patiṣyati mahāghore niraye jananī mama // RamS_2,97.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5619: tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:5620: abhiṣiñcasva cādyaiva rājyena maghavān iva // RamS_2,97.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5621: imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā mātaraś ca yāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5622: tvatsakāśam anuprāptāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // RamS_2,97.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5623: tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada /
GE09ram_02su:5624: rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru // RamS_2,97.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5625: bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:5626: śaśinā vimaleneva śāradī rajanī yathā // RamS_2,97.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5627: ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā /
GE09ram_02su:5628: bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // RamS_2,97.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5629: tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam /
GE09ram_02su:5632: rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ // RamS_2,97.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5633: taṃ mattam iva mātaṃgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5634: bhrātaraṃ bharataṃ rāmaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt // RamS_2,97.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5636: rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ // RamS_2,97.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5637: na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy arisūdana /
GE09ram_02su:5638: na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi // RamS_2,97.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5640: tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam // RamS_2,97.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5642: mātāpitṛbhyām ukto 'haṃ katham anyat samācare // RamS_2,97.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5646: vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // RamS_2,97.21 //
GE09ram_02su:5647: sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava /
GE09ram_02su:5648: pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi // RamS_2,97.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5650: upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā // RamS_2,97.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5651: yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5652: tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam //
GE09ram_02su:5655: śocatām eva rajanī duḥkhena vyatyavartata // RamS_2,98.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5657: mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman // RamS_2,98.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5658: tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaścit kiṃcid abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:5659: bharatas tu suhṛnmadhye rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,98.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5660: sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:5661: tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam // RamS_2,98.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5663: durāvāraṃ tvadanyena rājyakhaṇḍam idaṃ mahat // RamS_2,98.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5665: anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate // RamS_2,98.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5666: sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate /
GE09ram_02su:5667: rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati // RamS_2,98.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5668: yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5670: sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet /
GE09ram_02su:5671: sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ // RamS_2,98.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5672: eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:5673: yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi // RamS_2,98.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5674: śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5675: pratapantam ivādityaṃ rājye sthitam ariṃdamam // RamS_2,98.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5678: tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5679: bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaṃ pratyanuyācataḥ // RamS_2,98.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5680: tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam /
GE09ram_02su:5681: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bharataṃ samāśvāsayad ātmavān // RamS_2,98.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5683: itaś cetarataś cainaṃ kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati // RamS_2,98.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5685: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam // RamS_2,98.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5686: yathā phalānāṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam /
GE09ram_02su:5687: evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam // RamS_2,98.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5691: āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ // RamS_2,98.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5692: ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi /
GE09ram_02su:5693: āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca // RamS_2,98.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5694: sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati /
GE09ram_02su:5695: gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate // RamS_2,98.21 //
GE09ram_02su:5696: gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5697: jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet // RamS_2,98.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5698: nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau /
GE09ram_02su:5700: hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam /
GE09ram_02su:5702: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave /
GE09ram_02su:5703: sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃcana // RamS_2,98.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5704: evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca /
GE09ram_02su:5705: sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ // RamS_2,98.26 //
GE09ram_02su:5706: nātra kaścid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate /
GE09ram_02su:5707: tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ // RamS_2,98.27 //
GE09ram_02su:5708: yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaścit pathi sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5709: aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti // RamS_2,98.28 //
GE09ram_02su:5710: evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5711: tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ // RamS_2,98.29 //
GE09ram_02su:5713: ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ // RamS_2,98.30 //
GE09ram_02su:5714: dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5715: dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // RamS_2,98.31 //
GE09ram_02su:5717: arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,98.32 //
GE09ram_02su:5718: iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān /
GE09ram_02su:5719: uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // RamS_2,98.33 //
GE09ram_02su:5720: sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5722: taṃ tu naivaṃvidhaḥ kaścit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati /
GE09ram_02su:5723: tvadvidho yadvidhaś cāpi śrutavān buddhimattaraḥ // RamS_2,98.35 //
GE09ram_02su:5725: varjanīyā hi dhīreṇa sarvāvasthāsu dhīmatā // RamS_2,98.36 //
GE09ram_02su:5726: sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02su:5727: tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāṃ vara // RamS_2,98.37 //
GE09ram_02su:5729: tatraivāhaṃ kariṣyāmi pitur āryasya śāsanam // RamS_2,98.38 //
GE09ram_02su:5730: na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama /
GE09ram_02su:5731: tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā // RamS_2,98.39 //
GE09ram_02su:5732: evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat /
GE09ram_02su:5733: uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,98.40 //
GE09ram_02su:5734: ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama /
GE09ram_02su:5735: na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet // RamS_2,98.41 //
GE09ram_02su:5736: saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān /
GE09ram_02su:5737: yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati // RamS_2,98.42 //
GE09ram_02su:5738: yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5739: sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati // RamS_2,98.43 //
GE09ram_02su:5741: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava // RamS_2,98.44 //
GE09ram_02su:5742: na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam /
GE09ram_02su:5744: proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:5745: kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama // RamS_2,98.46 //
GE09ram_02su:5747: hanmi tīvreṇa daṇḍena daṇḍārhāṃ pāpakāriṇīm // RamS_2,98.47 //
GE09ram_02su:5749: jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam // RamS_2,98.48 //
GE09ram_02su:5750: guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca /
GE09ram_02su:5751: tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi // RamS_2,98.49 //
GE09ram_02su:5752: ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam /
GE09ram_02su:5753: striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit // RamS_2,98.50 //
GE09ram_02su:5755: rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā // RamS_2,98.51 //
GE09ram_02su:5756: sādhvartham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt /
GE09ram_02su:5757: tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān // RamS_2,98.52 //
GE09ram_02su:5758: pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate /
GE09ram_02su:5759: tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā // RamS_2,98.53 //
GE09ram_02su:5760: tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5761: abhipattā kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam // RamS_2,98.54 //
GE09ram_02su:5762: kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5763: paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān // RamS_2,98.55 //
GE09ram_02su:5764: kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam /
GE09ram_02su:5765: īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati // RamS_2,98.56 //
GE09ram_02su:5766: atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:5767: dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi // RamS_2,98.57 //
GE09ram_02su:5768: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam /
GE09ram_02su:5769: āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi // RamS_2,98.58 //
GE09ram_02su:5770: śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham /
GE09ram_02su:5771: sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati // RamS_2,98.59 //
GE09ram_02su:5772: hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham /
GE09ram_02su:5773: bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe // RamS_2,98.60 //
GE09ram_02su:5774: idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:5775: anuśādhi svadharmeṇa dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ // RamS_2,98.61 //
GE09ram_02su:5777: ṛtvijaḥ savasiṣṭhāś ca mantravan mantrakovidāḥ // RamS_2,98.62 //
GE09ram_02su:5778: abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja /
GE09ram_02su:5779: vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ // RamS_2,98.63 //
GE09ram_02su:5780: ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan /
GE09ram_02su:5781: suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām // RamS_2,98.64 //
GE09ram_02su:5783: adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa // RamS_2,98.65 //
GE09ram_02su:5784: ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:5785: adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt // RamS_2,98.66 //
GE09ram_02su:5787: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ // RamS_2,98.67 //
GE09ram_02su:5788: atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5789: gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham // RamS_2,98.68 //
GE09ram_02su:5790: tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyatā prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5791: na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:5792: tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5793: na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02su:5794: tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5795: tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha //
GE09ram_02su:5797: punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5799: upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5800: jātaḥ putro daśarathāt kaikeyyāṃ rājasattamāt // RamS_2,99.2 //
GE09ram_02su:5801: purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan /
GE09ram_02su:5803: devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5804: samprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ // RamS_2,99.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5805: tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:5806: ayācata naraśreṣṭhaṃ dvau varau varavarṇinī // RamS_2,99.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5807: tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:5808: tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam // RamS_2,99.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5809: tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:5810: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi varadānikam // RamS_2,99.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5811: so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5812: śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ // RamS_2,99.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5813: bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam /
GE09ram_02su:5814: kartum arhati rājendraṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecanāt // RamS_2,99.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5815: ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum /
GE09ram_02su:5816: pitaraṃ trāhi dharmajña mātaraṃ cābhinandaya // RamS_2,99.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5817: śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:5818: gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitḥn prati // RamS_2,99.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5819: puṃnāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5820: tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitḥn yat pāti vā sutaḥ // RamS_2,99.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5822: teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaścid gayāṃ vrajet // RamS_2,99.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5824: tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho // RamS_2,99.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5826: śatrughnasahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ // RamS_2,99.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5828: ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // RamS_2,99.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5829: tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām /
GE09ram_02su:5830: gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya samprahṛṣṭaḥ saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye // RamS_2,99.17
GE09ram_02su:5831: chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām /
GE09ram_02su:5832: eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye //
GE09ram_02su:5833: śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram
GE09ram_02su:5834: catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam
GE09ram_02su:5837: uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,100.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5838: sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā /
GE09ram_02su:5840: kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kenacit /
GE09ram_02su:5841: yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati // RamS_2,100.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5842: tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5843: unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kāciddhi kasyacit // RamS_2,100.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5844: yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaścit kvacid vaset /
GE09ram_02su:5845: utsṛjya ca tam āvāsaṃ pratiṣṭhetāpare 'hani // RamS_2,100.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5846: evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu /
GE09ram_02su:5847: āvāsamātraṃ kākutstha sajjante nātra sajjanāḥ // RamS_2,100.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5848: pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama /
GE09ram_02su:5849: āsthātuṃ kāpathaṃ duḥkhaṃ viṣamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam // RamS_2,100.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5851: ekaveṇīdharā hi tvāṃ nagarī sampratīkṣate // RamS_2,100.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5853: vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape // RamS_2,100.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5854: na te kaścid daśaratas tvaṃ ca tasya na kaścana /
GE09ram_02su:5855: anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate // RamS_2,100.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5856: gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai /
GE09ram_02su:5857: pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase // RamS_2,100.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5858: arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān /
GE09ram_02su:5859: te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire // RamS_2,100.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5861: annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati // RamS_2,100.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5862: yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati /
GE09ram_02su:5863: dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet // RamS_2,100.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5864: dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5865: yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja // RamS_2,100.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5866: sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate /
GE09ram_02su:5867: pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru // RamS_2,100.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5869: rājyaṃ tvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bharatena prasāditaḥ // RamS_2,100.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5871: jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5872: uvāca parayā yuktyā svabuddhyā cāvipannayā // RamS_2,101.1 //
GE09ram_02su:5873: bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān /
GE09ram_02su:5876: mānaṃ na labhate satsu bhinnacāritradarśanaḥ // RamS_2,101.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5878: cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim // RamS_2,101.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5879: anāryas tv āryasaṃkāśaḥ śaucāddhīnas tathā śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5880: lakṣaṇyavad alakṣaṇyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavān iva // RamS_2,101.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5884: bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam // RamS_2,101.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5885: kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām /
GE09ram_02su:5887: kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate /
GE09ram_02su:5888: yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ // RamS_2,101.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5890: tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // RamS_2,101.10 //
GE09ram_02su:5891: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire /
GE09ram_02su:5892: satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam // RamS_2,101.11 //
GE09ram_02su:5894: dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate // RamS_2,101.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5895: satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā /
GE09ram_02su:5896: satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam // RamS_2,101.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5897: dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:5898: vedāḥ satyapratiṣṭhānās tasmāt satyaparo bhavet // RamS_2,101.14 //
GE09ram_02su:5899: ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam /
GE09ram_02su:5900: majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate // RamS_2,101.15 //
GE09ram_02su:5901: so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye /
GE09ram_02su:5903: naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5904: setuṃ satyasya bhetsyāmi guroḥ satyapratiśravaḥ // RamS_2,101.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5906: naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam // RamS_2,101.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5907: pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:5909: kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam /
GE09ram_02su:5910: kṣudrair nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ // RamS_2,101.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5911: kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā sampradhārya ca /
GE09ram_02su:5912: anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam // RamS_2,101.21 //
GE09ram_02su:5913: bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi /
GE09ram_02su:5914: svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat // RamS_2,101.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5915: śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām /
GE09ram_02su:5916: āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha // RamS_2,101.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5917: kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5918: bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ // RamS_2,101.24 //
GE09ram_02su:5920: prahṛṣṭamānasā devī kaikeyī cābhavat tadā // RamS_2,101.25 //
GE09ram_02su:5922: mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitḥn devāṃś ca tarpayan // RamS_2,101.26
GE09ram_02su:5925: karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham /
GE09ram_02su:5926: agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ // RamS_2,101.28 //
GE09ram_02su:5927: śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5928: tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ // RamS_2,101.29 //
GE09ram_02su:5929: satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca /
GE09ram_02su:5930: dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:5931: dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5932: ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:5934: kruddham ājñāya rāmaṃ tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:5936: nivartayitukāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,102.1 //*
GE09ram_02su:5938: sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā /
GE09ram_02su:5939: tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha // RamS_2,102.2 //*
GE09ram_02su:5940: sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:5941: asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ // RamS_2,102.3 //
GE09ram_02su:5943: tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,102.4 //
GE09ram_02su:5944: vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivasvataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5945: sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,102.5 //
GE09ram_02su:5946: yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī /
GE09ram_02su:5947: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam // RamS_2,102.6 //
GE09ram_02su:5948: ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5949: kukṣer athātmajo vīro vikukṣir udapadyata // RamS_2,102.7 //
GE09ram_02su:5950: vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02su:5951: bāṇasya tu mahābāhur anaraṇyo mahāyaśāḥ // RamS_2,102.8 //
GE09ram_02su:5952: nānāvṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare /
GE09ram_02su:5953: anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaścana // RamS_2,102.9 //
GE09ram_02su:5954: anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha /
GE09ram_02su:5956: sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,102.10 //*
GE09ram_02su:5960: māndhātus tu mahātejāḥ susaṃdhir udapadyata // RamS_2,102.12 //
GE09ram_02su:5961: susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit /
GE09ram_02su:5962: yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ // RamS_2,102.13 //
GE09ram_02su:5963: bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata /
GE09ram_02su:5965: haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ // RamS_2,102.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:5966: tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5967: sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5968: dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ // RamS_2,102.15 //*
GE09ram_02su:5970: tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat // RamS_2,102.16 //
GE09ram_02su:5971: sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani /
GE09ram_02su:5972: tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata // RamS_2,102.17 //
GE09ram_02su:5973: sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā /
GE09ram_02su:5974: gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat // RamS_2,102.18 //
GE09ram_02su:5975: sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat /
GE09ram_02su:5976: iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ // RamS_2,102.19 //
GE09ram_02su:5977: asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam /
