GE09ram_02su:5978: jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt // RamS_2,102.20 //
GE09ram_02su:5981: bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5982: kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,102.22 //
GE09ram_02su:5983: raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5984: kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi // RamS_2,102.23 //
GE09ram_02su:5986: yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat // RamS_2,102.24 //
GE09ram_02su:5987: śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5989: śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5992: nahuṣasya ca nābhāgaḥ putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ // RamS_2,102.27 //
GE09ram_02su:5993: ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:5994: ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,102.28 //
GE09ram_02su:5995: tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5996: tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa // RamS_2,102.29 //
GE09ram_02su:5997: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:5999: sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:6000: prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:6002: vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6003: abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,103.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6005: ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava // RamS_2,103.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6006: pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:6007: prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate // RamS_2,103.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6008: sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02su:6009: mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // RamS_2,103.4 //
GE09ram_02su:6010: imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6011: eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // RamS_2,103.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6013: asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // RamS_2,103.6 //
GE09ram_02su:6016: evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:6018: yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:6019: na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam // RamS_2,103.9 //
GE09ram_02su:6021: nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca // RamS_2,103.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6022: sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama /
GE09ram_02su:6023: ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,103.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6024: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram /
GE09ram_02su:6026: iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe /
GE09ram_02su:6027: āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati // RamS_2,103.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6029: śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati // RamS_2,103.14 //
GE09ram_02su:6030: sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6031: kuśottaram upasthāpya bhūmāv evāstarat svayam // RamS_2,103.15 //
GE09ram_02su:6033: kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi // RamS_2,103.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6034: brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati /
GE09ram_02su:6035: na tu mūrdhāvasiktānāṃ vidhiḥ pratyupaveśane // RamS_2,103.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6037: puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava // RamS_2,103.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6038: āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:6039: uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha // RamS_2,103.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6040: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6041: kākutstham abhijānīmaḥ samyag vadati rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,103.20 //
GE09ram_02su:6042: eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02su:6043: ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā // RamS_2,103.21 //
GE09ram_02su:6044: teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:6045: evaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ suhṛdāṃ dharmacakṣuṣām // RamS_2,103.22 //
GE09ram_02su:6046: etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:6047: uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam // RamS_2,103.23 //
GE09ram_02su:6048: athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:6049: śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā // RamS_2,103.24 //
GE09ram_02su:6050: na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram /
GE09ram_02su:6052: yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6053: aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ // RamS_2,103.26 //
GE09ram_02su:6054: dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6055: uvāca rāmaḥ samprekṣya paurajānapadaṃ janam // RamS_2,103.27 //
GE09ram_02su:6056: vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama /
GE09ram_02su:6057: na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā // RamS_2,103.28 //
GE09ram_02su:6058: upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6059: yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam // RamS_2,103.29 //
GE09ram_02su:6061: sarvam evātra kalyāṇaṃ satyasaṃdhe mahātmani // RamS_2,103.30 //
GE09ram_02su:6063: bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ // RamS_2,103.31 //
GE09ram_02su:6064: vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tadvacanaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:6065: anṛtān mocayānena pitaraṃ taṃ mahīpatim // RamS_2,103.32 //
GE09ram_02su:6068: vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ // RamS_2,104.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6069: antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6070: tau bhrātarau mahātmānau kākutsthau praśaśaṃsire // RamS_2,104.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6071: sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau /
GE09ram_02su:6072: śrutvā vayaṃ hi sambhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe // RamS_2,104.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6074: bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ // RamS_2,104.4 //
GE09ram_02su:6076: grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase // RamS_2,104.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6077: sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6078: anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // RamS_2,104.6 //
GE09ram_02su:6080: rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ // RamS_2,104.7 //
GE09ram_02su:6082: rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭavadanas tān ṛṣīn abhyapūjayat // RamS_2,104.8 //
GE09ram_02su:6083: srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā /
GE09ram_02su:6084: kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt // RamS_2,104.9 //
GE09ram_02su:6086: kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām // RamS_2,104.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6087: rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe /
GE09ram_02su:6088: paurajānapadāṃś cāpi raktān rañjayituṃ tathā // RamS_2,104.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6089: jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6090: tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ // RamS_2,104.12 //
GE09ram_02su:6091: idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi /
GE09ram_02su:6092: śaktimān asi kākutstha lokasya paripālane // RamS_2,104.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6093: ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:6094: bhṛśaṃ samprārthayāmāsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃvadaḥ // RamS_2,104.14 //
GE09ram_02su:6095: tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:6097: āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā /
GE09ram_02su:6098: bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api // RamS_2,104.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6099: amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6100: sarvakāryāṇi saṃmantrya sumahānty api kāraya // RamS_2,104.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6101: lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet /
GE09ram_02su:6102: atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ // RamS_2,104.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6103: kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:6104: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat // RamS_2,104.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6108: ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ // RamS_2,104.21 //
GE09ram_02su:6109: so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca /
GE09ram_02su:6111: sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān svalaṃkṛte samparigṛhya dharmavit /
GE09ram_02su:6112: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani //
GE09ram_02su:6113: athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs tathānujau /
GE09ram_02su:6114: vyasarjayad rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ sthitaḥ svadharme himavān ivācalaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:6115: taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭhyo duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6116: sa tv eva mātḥn abhivādya sarvā rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:6118: tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:6119: āruroha rathaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // RamS_2,105.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6120: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6121: agrataḥ prayayuḥ sarve mantriṇo mantrapūjitāḥ // RamS_2,105.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6122: mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:6123: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim // RamS_2,105.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6125: prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā // RamS_2,105.4 //
GE09ram_02su:6127: āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ // RamS_2,105.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6128: sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān /
GE09ram_02su:6129: avatīrya rathāt pādau vavande kulanandanaḥ // RamS_2,105.6 //
GE09ram_02su:6130: tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:6131: api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam // RamS_2,105.7 //
GE09ram_02su:6132: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:6134: sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6135: rāghavaḥ paramaprīto vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,105.9 //
GE09ram_02su:6136: pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6137: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi yā pratijñā pitur mama // RamS_2,105.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6138: evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:6139: vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ rāghavaṃ vacanaṃ mahat // RamS_2,105.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6142: evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6143: pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau // RamS_2,105.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6145: ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe // RamS_2,105.14 //
GE09ram_02su:6146: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6147: bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat // RamS_2,105.15 //
GE09ram_02su:6149: yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam // RamS_2,105.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6150: amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava /
GE09ram_02su:6151: yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ // RamS_2,105.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6152: tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6153: āmantrayitum ārebhe caraṇāv upagṛhya ca // RamS_2,105.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6154: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6155: bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ // RamS_2,105.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6156: yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayair nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6158: tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm /
GE09ram_02su:6159: dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm // RamS_2,105.21 //
GE09ram_02su:6163: bharato duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sārathiṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,105.23 //
GE09ram_02su:6164: sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate /
GE09ram_02su:6168: ayodhyāṃ bharataḥ kṣipraṃ praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ // RamS_2,106.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6170: timirābhyāhatāṃ kālīm aprakāśāṃ niśām iva // RamS_2,106.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6176: havirabhyukṣitāṃ paścāc chikhāṃ vipralayaṃ gatām // RamS_2,106.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6178: hatapravīrām āpannāṃ camūm iva mahāhave // RamS_2,106.6 //
GE09ram_02su:6181: tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6182: sutyākāle vinirvṛtte vediṃ gataravām iva // RamS_2,106.8 //
GE09ram_02su:6183: goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam /
GE09ram_02su:6184: govṛṣeṇa parityaktāṃ gavāṃ patnīm ivotsukām // RamS_2,106.9 //
GE09ram_02su:6186: viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva // RamS_2,106.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6187: sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām /
GE09ram_02su:6188: saṃhṛtadyutivistārāṃ tārām iva divaś cyutām // RamS_2,106.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6196: upayuktodakāṃ bhagnāṃ prapāṃ nipatitām iva // RamS_2,106.15 //
GE09ram_02su:6198: bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt // RamS_2,106.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6200: nikṣiptabhāṇḍām utsṛṣṭāṃ kiśorīm iva durbalām // RamS_2,106.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6202: pracchannāṃ nīlajīmūtair bhāskarasya prabhām iva // RamS_2,106.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6203: bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6204: vāhayantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,106.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6205: kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate /
GE09ram_02su:6208: dhūpitāgarugandhaś ca na pravāti samantataḥ // RamS_2,106.21 //
GE09ram_02su:6211: nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite // RamS_2,106.22 //*
GE09ram_02su:6213: saṃpatadbhir ayodhyāyāṃ na vibhānti mahāpathāḥ // RamS_2,106.23 //
GE09ram_02su:6214: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6215: tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva // RamS_2,106.24 //
GE09ram_02su:6217: tato nikṣipya mātḥn sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6218: bharataḥ śokasaṃtapto gurūn idam athābravīt // RamS_2,107.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6220: tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā // RamS_2,107.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6221: gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama /
GE09ram_02su:6222: rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ // RamS_2,107.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6223: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6224: abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ // RamS_2,107.4 //
GE09ram_02su:6225: sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:6226: vacanaṃ bhrātṛvātsalyād anurūpaṃ tavaiva tat // RamS_2,107.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6228: āryamārgaṃ prapannasya nānumanyeta kaḥ pumān // RamS_2,107.6 //
GE09ram_02su:6230: abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti // RamS_2,107.7 //
GE09ram_02su:6232: āruroha rathaṃ śrīmāñ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // RamS_2,107.8 //
GE09ram_02su:6233: āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:6236: prayayuḥ prāṅmukhāḥ sarve nandigrāmo yato 'bhavat // RamS_2,107.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6238: prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ // RamS_2,107.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6239: rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6240: nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke // RamS_2,107.12 //
GE09ram_02su:6241: tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6242: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha // RamS_2,107.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6243: etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam /
GE09ram_02su:6245: tam imaṃ pālayiṣyāmi rāghavāgamanaṃ prati // RamS_2,107.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:6246: kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:6247: caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau // RamS_2,107.15 //
GE09ram_02su:6249: nivedya gurave rājyaṃ bhajiṣye guruvṛttitām // RamS_2,107.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6251: rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca // RamS_2,107.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6253: prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam // RamS_2,107.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6254: evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6255: nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ duḥkhito mantribhiḥ saha // RamS_2,107.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6257: nandigrāme 'vasad vīraḥ sasainyo bharatas tadā // RamS_2,107.20 //
GE09ram_02su:6259: bhrātur vacanakārī ca pratijñāpāragas tadā // RamS_2,107.21 //
GE09ram_02su:6261: bharataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ pādukābhyāṃ nyavedayat // RamS_2,107.22 //
GE09ram_02su:6266: rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān // RamS_2,108.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6267: nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6268: anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ // RamS_2,108.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6269: teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6270: kṛtāñjalir uvācedam ṛṣiṃ kulapatiṃ tataḥ // RamS_2,108.4 //
GE09ram_02su:6271: na kaccid bhagavan kiṃcit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi /
GE09ram_02su:6272: dṛśyate vikṛtaṃ yena vikriyante tapasvinaḥ // RamS_2,108.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6273: pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃcin nāvarajasya me /
GE09ram_02su:6276: pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate // RamS_2,108.7 //
GE09ram_02su:6277: atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6280: calanaṃ tāta vaidehyās tapasviṣu viśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,108.9 //
GE09ram_02su:6281: tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate /
GE09ram_02su:6282: rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ // RamS_2,108.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6285: dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6286: avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate // RamS_2,108.12 //
GE09ram_02su:6287: tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase /
GE09ram_02su:6288: tadā prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi viprakurvanti tāpasān // RamS_2,108.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6289: darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api /
GE09ram_02su:6290: nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ // RamS_2,108.14 //
GE09ram_02su:6292: pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitāḥ // RamS_2,108.15 //
GE09ram_02su:6293: teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca /
GE09ram_02su:6296: kalaśāṃś ca pramṛdnanti havane samupasthite // RamS_2,108.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6299: tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu /
GE09ram_02su:6300: darśayanti hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam // RamS_2,108.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6302: purāṇāśramam evāhaṃ śrayiṣye sagaṇaḥ punaḥ // RamS_2,108.20 //
GE09ram_02su:6303: kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate /
GE09ram_02su:6304: sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate // RamS_2,108.21 //
GE09ram_02su:6305: sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:6306: samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkham ihādya te // RamS_2,108.22 //
GE09ram_02su:6307: ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam /
GE09ram_02su:6308: na śaśākottarair vākyair avaroddhuṃ samutsukam // RamS_2,108.23 //
GE09ram_02su:6310: sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha // RamS_2,108.24 //
GE09ram_02su:6311: rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād deśāt tasmāt kulapatim abhivādyarṣim /
GE09ram_02su:6312: samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede // RamS_2,108.25
GE09ram_02su:6313: āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6314: rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās tāpasāś cārṣacaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:6317: na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā // RamS_2,109.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6318: iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6319: sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ // RamS_2,109.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6321: hayahastikarīṣaiś ca upamardaḥ kṛto bhṛśam // RamS_2,109.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6322: tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6323: prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ // RamS_2,109.4 //
GE09ram_02su:6324: so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6325: taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata // RamS_2,109.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6326: svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:6327: saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat // RamS_2,109.6 //
GE09ram_02su:6328: patnīṃ ca samanuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām /
GE09ram_02su:6333: daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram // RamS_2,109.9 //
GE09ram_02su:6334: yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā /
GE09ram_02su:6335: ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā // RamS_2,109.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6337: anasūyāvratais tāta pratyūhāś ca nibarhitāḥ // RamS_2,109.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6339: daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha // RamS_2,109.12 //
GE09ram_02su:6341: abhigacchatu vaidehī vṛddhām akrodhanāṃ sadā // RamS_2,109.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6342: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6343: sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam // RamS_2,109.14 //
GE09ram_02su:6344: rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam /
GE09ram_02su:6345: śreyo'rtham ātmanaḥ śīghram abhigaccha tapasvinīm // RamS_2,109.15 //
GE09ram_02su:6346: anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ khyātim āgatā /
GE09ram_02su:6347: tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm // RamS_2,109.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6348: sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:6349: tām atripatnīṃ dharmajñām abhicakrāma maithilī // RamS_2,109.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6351: satataṃ vepamānāṅgīṃ pravāte kadalī yathā // RamS_2,109.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6352: tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām /
GE09ram_02su:6353: abhyavādayad avyagrā svaṃ nāma samudāharat // RamS_2,109.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6354: abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām /
GE09ram_02su:6356: tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:6357: sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase // RamS_2,109.21 //
GE09ram_02su:6358: tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini /
GE09ram_02su:6359: avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi // RamS_2,109.22 //
GE09ram_02su:6360: nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6361: yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ // RamS_2,109.23 //
GE09ram_02su:6362: duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6363: strīṇām āryasvabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ // RamS_2,109.24 //
GE09ram_02su:6364: nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham /
GE09ram_02su:6365: sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam // RamS_2,109.25 //
GE09ram_02su:6366: na tv evam avagacchanti guṇadoṣam asatstriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6368: prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili /
GE09ram_02su:6369: akāryavaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tadvidhāḥ // RamS_2,109.27 //
GE09ram_02su:6371: striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā // RamS_2,109.28 //
GE09ram_02su:6373: sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyānasūyayā /
GE09ram_02su:6374: pratipūjya vaco mandaṃ pravaktum upacakrame // RamS_2,110.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6375: naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase /
GE09ram_02su:6376: viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ // RamS_2,110.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6377: yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6378: advaidham upacartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet // RamS_2,110.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6379: kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6381: yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6382: tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate // RamS_2,110.5 //
GE09ram_02su:6383: sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6384: mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit // RamS_2,110.6 //
GE09ram_02su:6385: āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:6386: samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama // RamS_2,110.7 //
GE09ram_02su:6387: pāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau /
GE09ram_02su:6388: anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam // RamS_2,110.8 //
GE09ram_02su:6389: navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi /
GE09ram_02su:6390: patiśuśrūṣaṇān nāryās tapo nānyad vidhīyate // RamS_2,110.9 //
GE09ram_02su:6392: tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam // RamS_2,110.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6393: variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā /
GE09ram_02su:6394: rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate // RamS_2,110.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6396: devaloke mahīyante puṇyena svena karmaṇā // RamS_2,110.12 //
GE09ram_02su:6398: śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta // RamS_2,110.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6399: niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me /
GE09ram_02su:6400: tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate // RamS_2,110.14 //
GE09ram_02su:6401: upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili /
GE09ram_02su:6402: prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me /
GE09ram_02su:6403: kṛtam ity abravīt sītā tapobalasamanvitām // RamS_2,110.15 //*
GE09ram_02su:6404: sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat /
GE09ram_02su:6405: saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham // RamS_2,110.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6406: idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:6407: aṅgarāgaṃ ca vaidehi mahārham anulepanam // RamS_2,110.17 //
GE09ram_02su:6408: mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet /
GE09ram_02su:6409: anurūpam asaṃkliṣṭaṃ nityam eva bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,110.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6411: śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam // RamS_2,110.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6412: sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:6414: pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:6417: vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃcid anupriyām // RamS_2,110.22 //
GE09ram_02su:6418: svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā /
GE09ram_02su:6419: rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā // RamS_2,110.23 //
GE09ram_02su:6420: tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili /
GE09ram_02su:6421: yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // RamS_2,110.24 //
GE09ram_02su:6422: evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:6423: śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayāmāsa tāṃ kathām // RamS_2,110.25 //
GE09ram_02su:6425: kṣatradharmaṇy abhirato nyāyataḥ śāsti medinīm // RamS_2,110.26 //
GE09ram_02su:6427: ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā // RamS_2,110.27 //
GE09ram_02su:6430: anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam /
GE09ram_02su:6431: mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ // RamS_2,110.29 //
GE09ram_02su:6433: evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava // RamS_2,110.30 //
GE09ram_02su:6434: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6435: avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ // RamS_2,110.31 //
GE09ram_02su:6437: tayā saṃbhāvitā cāsmi snigdhayā mātṛsauhṛdāt // RamS_2,110.32 //
GE09ram_02su:6438: patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā /
GE09ram_02su:6439: cintām abhyagamad dīno vittanāśād ivādhanaḥ // RamS_2,110.33 //
GE09ram_02su:6440: sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt /
GE09ram_02su:6441: pradharṣaṇām avāpnoti śakreṇāpi samo bhuvi // RamS_2,110.34 //
GE09ram_02su:6444: ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan /
GE09ram_02su:6445: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama // RamS_2,110.36 //
GE09ram_02su:6446: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam /
GE09ram_02su:6447: svayaṃ varaṃ tanūjāyāḥ kariṣyāmīti dhīmataḥ // RamS_2,110.37 //
GE09ram_02su:6449: dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // RamS_2,110.38 //
GE09ram_02su:6450: asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt /
GE09ram_02su:6451: tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ // RamS_2,110.39 //
GE09ram_02su:6452: tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā /
GE09ram_02su:6453: samavāye narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam āmantrya pārthivān // RamS_2,110.40 //
GE09ram_02su:6454: idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6455: tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,110.41 //
GE09ram_02su:6456: tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham /
GE09ram_02su:6457: abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane // RamS_2,110.42 //
GE09ram_02su:6459: viśvāmitreṇa sahito yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ // RamS_2,110.43 //
GE09ram_02su:6461: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ // RamS_2,110.44 //
GE09ram_02su:6464: ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat // RamS_2,110.45 //*
GE09ram_02su:6466: jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayāmāsa vīryavān // RamS_2,110.46 //
GE09ram_02su:6467: tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6468: tasya śabdo 'bhavad bhīmaḥ patitasyāśaner iva // RamS_2,110.47 //
GE09ram_02su:6470: udyatā dātum udyamya jalabhājanam uttamam // RamS_2,110.48 //
GE09ram_02su:6471: dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6472: avijñāya pituś chandam ayodhyādhipateḥ prabhoḥ // RamS_2,110.49 //
GE09ram_02su:6473: tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:6474: mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane // RamS_2,110.50 //
GE09ram_02su:6476: bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam // RamS_2,110.51 //
GE09ram_02su:6477: evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃvare /
GE09ram_02su:6478: anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam // RamS_2,110.52 //
GE09ram_02su:6480: anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām /
GE09ram_02su:6481: paryaṣvajata bāhubhyāṃ śirasy āghrāya maithilīm // RamS_2,111.1 //
GE09ram_02su:6483: yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā // RamS_2,111.2 //
GE09ram_02su:6484: rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi /
GE09ram_02su:6485: ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām // RamS_2,111.3 //
GE09ram_02su:6487: saṃdhyākāle nilīnānāṃ nidrārthaṃ śrūyate dhvaniḥ // RamS_2,111.4 //
GE09ram_02su:6493: viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ // RamS_2,111.7 //
GE09ram_02su:6495: tapovanamṛgā hy ete veditīrtheṣu śerate // RamS_2,111.8 //
GE09ram_02su:6499: kathayantyā hi madhuraṃ tvayāhaṃ paritoṣitā // RamS_2,111.10 //
GE09ram_02su:6500: alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili /
GE09ram_02su:6501: prītiṃ janaya me vatsa divyālaṃkāraśobhinī // RamS_2,111.11 //
GE09ram_02su:6503: praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau // RamS_2,111.12 //
GE09ram_02su:6504: tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6505: rāghavaḥ prītidānena tapasvinyā jaharṣa ca // RamS_2,111.13 //
GE09ram_02su:6506: nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī /
GE09ram_02su:6508: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6509: maithilyāḥ satkriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mānuṣeṣu sudurlabhām // RamS_2,111.15 //
GE09ram_02su:6510: tatas tāṃ śarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6511: arcitas tāpasaiḥ siddhair uvāsa raghunandanaḥ // RamS_2,111.16 //
GE09ram_02su:6514: tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6515: vanasya tasya saṃcāraṃ rākṣasaiḥ samabhiplutam // RamS_2,111.18 //
GE09ram_02su:6516: eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:6517: anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam // RamS_2,111.19 //
GE09ram_02su:6518: itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:6519: vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam //
